h4.p: [03] ^b^i gatiya.m^eb^. yesa.m dhaatuuna.m gatiattho, buddhipi tesa.m attho. pavattipaapu.naanipi. tatra gamana.m duvidha.m kaayagamana.m ~naa.nagamana~nca. tesu ^b^kaayagamana.m^eb^ naama iriyaapathagamana.m, ^b^~naa.nagamana.m^eb^ naama ~naa.nuppatti, tasmaa payogaanuruupena ``gacchatii''ti padassa ``jaanaatii''tipi attho bhavati, ``pavattatii''tipi attho bhavati, ``paapu.naatii''tipi attho bhavati, iriyaapathagamanena gacchatiitipi attho bhavati, ~naa.nagamanena gacchatiitipi attho bhavati. tathaa hi ``siigha.m gacchatii''tiaadiisu iriyaapathagamana.m ``gamana''nti vuccati. sundara.m nibbaana.m gato. ``gatimaa''tiaadiisu ^a^M0.0002^ea^ pana ~naa.nagamana.m. eva.m sabbesampi gatyatthaana.m dhaatuuna.m yathaapayoga.m attho gahetabbo.

[03] tassimaani ruupaani bhavanti -- iti, eti, udeti. kaarite ``udaayatii''ti ruupa.m bhavati. u.t.thaapetiiti hi attho, dukaaro aagamo. upeti, samupeti, veti, apeti, aveti, anveti, sameti, abhisameti, samayo, abhisamayo, iidi, udi, ekodi, pa.n.dito, ito, udito, upeto, samupeto, anvito, apeto, sameto, etabbo, paccetabbo, pa.tiyamaano, pa.ticco, ento, adhippeto, adhippaayo, paccayo, a~n~naanipi yojetabbaani. ``itaa, ita''ntiaadinaa yathaaraha.m itthinapu.msakavasenapi. paccetu.m, upetu.m, samupetu.m, anvetu.m, sametu.m, abhisametu.m, icca, pa.ticca, samecca, abhisamecca, apecca, upecca, pa.timukha.m itvaa, itvaana, upetvaa, upetvaana, upetuna, a~n~naanipi buddhavacanaanuruupato yojetabbaani.
[22] idamettha na vattabba.m, dassanaayeva me ruto..

[03] tatra ^b^itaaya^eb^nti iti ayanti chedo. ^b^iti^eb^iti ca gacchati pavattatiiti attho. aya.m panettha suttapadattho -- yo ^a^M0.0003^ea^ doso loke ``kodho''ti lokiyamahaajanena vuccati, naaya.m atthato kodhoti vattabbo. kinti pana vattabbo, eso hi sariirasa"nkhaataguhaasayo maccuraajaa eva kodhavasena pamaddanto sattasantaane gacchatiiti vattabbo. ta.m evaruupa.m ``maccuraajaa''ti vattabba.m bahuno janassa anatthakara.m kodha.m hitakaamo damena pa~n~naaya viiriyena di.t.thiyaa ca chindeyyaati.

[03] ^b^etii^eb^ti imassa pana aagacchatiiti attho. ``etii''ti ettha hi ^b^aa^eb^upasaggo sandhikiccena pa.ticchannattaa na paaka.to valaahakaavattharito pu.n.nacando viya. tathaa hi ettha aa iti etiiti sandhiviggaho bhavati, ^b^aa^eb^kaarassa ca ^b^i^eb^kaarena parena saddhi.myeva ^b^e^eb^kaaraadeso. tasmaa ``aya.m so saarathii eti. etu vessantaro raajaa''tiaadiisu ``aagacchati, aagacchatuu''tiaadinaa attho kathetabbo. byaakara.nasatthepi hi aa iti etiiti sandhiviggaho dissati, tasmaa ayampi niiti saadhuka.m manasi kaatabbaa. atha vaa ^b^itii^eb^ti rassavasena vutta.m pada.m gamana.m bodheti, ^b^etii^eb^ti vuddhivasena vutta.m pana yathaapayoga.m aagamanaadiini. mattaavasenapi hi padaani savisesatthaani bhavanti. ta.m yathaa? saasane pabbajito, ra.t.thaa pabbaajitoti. sa~n~nogaasa~n~nogavasenapi, ta.m yathaa? gaamaa niggacchati. yasa.m poso nigacchati, tasmaa ayampi niiti saadhuka.m manasi kaatabbaa. ettheta.m vuccati --
[21] ^b^i gatiya^eb^nti kathitaa, dhaatu vuddhi.m gataa yadaa.
[22] aagamane ca hotiiti, dhiimaa lakkheyya ta.m yathaa..

[03] tathaa hi iitiiti anatthaaya eti aagacchatiiti iiti, upaddavo, iti aagamanattho gahetabbo. aaha ca ^b^suttanipaata.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ ``etiiti iiti, aagantukaana.m akusalabhaagiina.m byasanahetuuna.m eta.m adhivacana''nti.

[03] idaani yathaaraha.m nipaataakhyaatanaamikapariyaapannaana.m ^b^itiito^eb^ saddaanamatthuddhaaro vuccate -- tattha ^b^iti^eb^saddo hetuparisamaapanaadipadattha vipariyaaya pakaaraavadhaara.na nidassanaadianekatthappabhedo. tathaa hesa ``ruppatiiti kho bhikkhave tasmaa ruupanti vuccatii''tiaadiisu hetuatthe dissati. ``tasmaatiha me bhikkhave dhammadaayaadaa bhavatha, maa aamisadaayaadaa. atthi me tumhesu anukampaa, kinti me saavakaa dhammadaayaadaa bhaveyyu.m, no aamisadaayaadaa''tiaadiisu parisamaapane. ``iti vaa iti evaruupaa visuukadassanaa pa.tivirato''tiaadiisu aadiattho. ``maaga.n.diyoti tassa braahma.nassa sa"nkhaa sama~n~naa pa~n~natti vohaaro naama.m naamakamma.m naamadheyya.m nirutti bya~njanamabhilaapo''tiaadiisu padatthavipariyaaye. ``iti kho bhikkhave sappa.tibhayo baalo, appa.tibhayo pa.n.dito. saupaddavo baalo, anupaddavo ^a^M0.0005^ea^ pa.n.dito. saupasaggo baalo, anupasaggo pa.n.dito''tiaadiisu pakaaro. ``atthi idappaccayaa jaraamara.nanti iti pu.t.thena sataa aadanda atthiitissa vacaniiya.m. ki.m paccayaa jaraamara.nanti iti ce vadeyya, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.nanti iccassa vacaniiya''ntiaadiisu avadhaara.ne. ``atthiiti kho kaccaana ayameko anto, natthiiti kho kaccaana aya.m dutiyo anto''tiaadiisu nidassane. nipaatavaseneva te payogaa gahetabbaa. ``itaaya.m kodharuupenaa''ti ettha pana aakhyaatavasena gamane ^b^iti^eb^saddo dissati. ayamevattho idhaadhippeto, nipaatattho pana na icchitabbo, vi~n~nuuna.m atthaggaha.ne kosallupaadanattha.m kevala.m atthuddhaaravasena aagatoti da.t.thabba.m. itaro pana --
[21] gatyattho icchito ettha, itarattho na icchito.

[03] idha pana ^b^samaya^eb^saddassa atthuddhaara.m sanibbacana.m vattabbampi avatvaa upari ^b^aya^eb^dhaatuvisayeyeva vakkhaama ^b^i e aya^eb^dhaatuvasena tidhaatumayattaa ^b^samaya^eb^saddassa. tatra ^b^itii^eb^ti ^b^i^eb^kaaraanantaratyantapadassa ca ``eti, udetii''tiaadiina~nca ^b^e^eb^kaaraanantara^b^tya^eb^ntapadaana.m a~n~nesa~nca evaruupaana.m padamaalaa yathaaraha.m yebhuyyena attanopadaani vajjetvaa yojetabbaa. iidisesu hi .thaanesu dukkaraa kriyaapadamaalaa. yasmaa pana imasmi.m pakara.ne sukaraa ca dukkaraa ca ^b^tya^eb^ntapadamaalaa jaanitabbaa ^a^M0.0006^ea^, tasmaa ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.naadiisu a.t.thasu ga.nesu vihitehi channavutiyaa vacanehi sabbasaadhaara.na.m asabbasaadhaara.na~nca padamaalaanaya.m bruuma --
[21] iti etii''ti cetesa.m, padaana.m pana pantiyo.
[22] ito mutto nayo naama, natthi koci kriyaapade..

[03] idaani ikaaraanantaratyantapadassa kamo vuccate -- iti, inti. isi, itha. imi, ima. aparipu.n.no vattamaanaanayo. itu, intu. ihi, itha. imi, ima. aparipu.n.no pa~ncamiinayo. ettha ca imesa.m dvinna.m saasanaanuruupabhaavassa imaani saadhakapadaani ^a^M0.0007^ea^ ``veti, apeti, anvetii''ti. tattha vi iti ^b^veti^eb^. vigacchatiiti attho, ^b^iti^eb^saddo hettha gamana.m bodheti. tathaa apa iti ^b^apeti^eb^. apagacchatiiti attho. anu iti ^b^anveti^eb^. anugacchatiiti attho. garuu pana anu eti ^b^anvetii^eb^ti vadanti. ta.m --
[22] eva.m ta.m anugacchaami, putte aadaaya pacchato''ti..

[07] imaaya paa.liyaa na sameti ``jessanta.m anvetii''ti vacanato ``anugacchaamii''ti vacanato ca. tathaa hi ^b^eti^eb^saddo yattha ce iriyaapathavaacako, tattha aagamana.myeva joteti, na gamana.m, tasmaa aagamanatthassa ayuttito gamanatthassa ca yuttito vi itiaadinaa chedo ~neyyo. etesa~nca ^b^iti^eb^saddavasena katachedaana.m atthibhaava.m yuttibhaava~nca ``itaaya.m kodharuupenaa''ti paa.liyeva saadheti, tasmaayeva ``anu iti, anu inti, anu isii''tiaadinaa ``anvetii''tiaadiina.m chede labbhamaananayena vuttappakaaro vattamaanaapa~ncamiinayo parassapadavasena dassito. sattamiiruupaadiini sabbathaa appasiddhaani.

[03] imaani pana bhavissantiyaa ruupaani, sittaa te lahumessati. issati, issanti. issasi, issatha. issaami, issaama. issate, issante. issase, issavhe. issa.m, issaamhe. asabbadhaatukattepi suddhassarattaa dhaatussa ^b^i^eb^kaaraagamo na labbhati. paripu.n.no bhavissantiinayo.

[03] atha kaalaatipattiyaa ruupaani bhavanti, issaa, issa.msu. isse, issatha. issa.m, issamhaa. issatha, issisu. issase, issavhe. issa.m, issaamhase. kaalaatipattibhaave ^a^M0.0008^ea^ ca asabbadhaatukatte ca santepi suddhassarattaa dhaatussa ^b^a^eb^kaab^rib^kaaraagamo na labbhati anekantikattaa vaa anupapannattaa ca ^b^a^eb^kaaraagamo na hoti. dvinna~nhettha suddhassaraana.m anantarikaana.m ekatosannipaato anupapatti. paripu.n.no kaalaatipattinayo.

[03] imasmi.m pana .thaane saa.t.thakathe tepi.take buddhavacane sotuuna.m payogatthesu paramakosallajananattha.m ``nanu te suta.m braahma.na bha~n~namaane, devaa na issanti purisaparakkamassaa''ti paa.lito naya.m gahetvaa vuttappakaarehi bhavissantiyaa ruupehi sabbaso samaanaani asamaanatthaani vattamaanikaruupaani ca iisaka.m a~n~nama~n~na.m samaanaani bhavissantiikaalaatipattiina.m ruupaani ca pakaasayissaama -- vattamaanaavasena taava ``issati, issanti. issasi, issathaa''ti sabba.m yojetabba.m. attho pana ``issa.m karotii''tiaadinaa vattabbo. tasmi.myeva atthe bhavissantiivasena ``ississati, ississanti. ississasi, ississathaa''ti paripu.n.na.m yojetabba.m. attho pana ``issa.m karissatii''tiaadinaa vattabbo. kaalaatipattivasena pana ``ississaa, ississa.msu. ississe, ississathaa''ti paripu.n.na.m yojetabba.m, attho pana ``issa.m akarissaa''tiaadinaa vattabbo. dhaatvantaravasena sa.msandanaanayoya.m.
[03] eti, enti. esi, etha. emi, ema.
[03] etu, entu. ehi, etha. emi, ema.
[21] na ca appatvaa dukkhanta.m, vissaasa.m eyya pa.n.dito.
[22] yadaa te pahi.nissaami, tadaa eyyaasi khattiya..
[03] eyya ^a^M0.0009^ea^, eyyu.m. eyyaasi, eyyaatha. eyyaami, eyyaama. etha, era.m. etho, eyyaavho. eyya.m, eyyaamhe.
[03] so puriso eyya, te eyyu.m. tva.m eyyaasi, tumhe eyyaatha. aha.m eyyaami, maya.m eyyaama. so puriso etha, te era.m. tva.m etho, tumhe eyyaavho. aha.m eyya.m, maya.m eyyaamhe.
[03] essati, essanti. essasi, essatha. essaami, essaama. essate, essante. essase, essavhe. essa.m, essaamhe.
[22] yadaa te vivadissanti, tadaa ehinti me vasa.m..
[03] ``abhidosagato idaani ehii''ti vacanadassanato aparaanipi bhavissantiiruupaani gahetabbaani.
[03] ehiti, ehinti. ehisi, ehitha. ehimi, ehima. ehite, ehinte. ehise, ehivhe. ehissa.m, ehissaamhe.
[03] essaa, essa.msu. esse, essatha. essa.m essaamhaa. essatha, essisu. essase, essavhe. essi.m, essaamhase.
[22] udeti, udenti. udesi, udetha. udemi, udema..
[03] udetu, udentu. udehi, udetha. udemi, udema, udaamase.
[03] udeyya, udeyyu.m. sesa.m neyya.m. udissati, udissanti. sesa.m neyya.m. udissaa, udissa.msu. sesa.m neyya.m.

[03] ^b^ku^eb^ ^a^M0.0010^ea^ ^b^sadde ke^eb^ ca. koti, kavati, kaayati, eva.m kattupadaani bhavanti. kuyyati, kiyyati, eva.m kammapadaani. kaanana.m, kabba.m, jaataka.m, eva.m naamikapadaani. kutvaa, kutvaana, kavitvaa, kavitvaana, kaavitvaa, kaavitvaana, kaayitu.m, eva.m abyayapadaani.
[03] tatra ^b^kaanana^eb^nti .thitamajjhanhikasamaye kavati sadda.m karotiiti kaanana.m, vana.m. tathaa hi --
[22] sa.nateva brahaara~n~na.m, saa rati pa.tibhaati ma''nti

[03] vutta.m. atha vaa kokilamayuuraadayo kavanti saddaayanti kuujanti etthaati kaanana.m. manoharataaya avassa.m kuyyati pa.n.ditehiiti ^b^kabba.m. kaaviya.m. kaaveyya.m^eb^. a~n~natra pana kaviina.m idanti ^b^kabba^eb^nti taddhitavasena attho gahetabbo. keci tu ^b^kaabya^eb^nti saddaruupa.m icchanti, na ta.m paavacane pamaa.na.m sakka.tabhaasaabhaavato. sakka.tabhaasaatopi hi aacariyaa naya.m ga.nhanti. jaata.m bhuuta.m atiita.m bhagavato cariya.m, ta.m kiiyati kathiiyati etenaati ^b^jaataka.m^eb^. jaatakapaa.li hi idha ``jaataka''nti vuttaa. a~n~natra pana jaata.m eva jaatakanti gahetabba.m. tathaa hi ^b^jaataka^eb^saddo desanaayampi vattati ``itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma''ntiaadiisu. jaatiyampi vattati ``jaataka.m samodhaanesii''tiaadiisu.

[03] ^b^pakka niicagatiya.m. niicagamana.m^eb^ naama hiinagamana.m hiinappavatti vaa. ^b^niica^eb^saddo hi hiinavaacako ``niice kule paccaajaato''ti ettha viya. pakkati kriyaapadamettha dissati, na naamikapada.m. yattha yattha naamikapada.m na dissati, tattha tattha naamikapada.m upaparikkhitvaa ^a^M0.0011^ea^ gahetabba.m. kriyaapadameva hi duddasa.m, kriyaapade vijjamaane naamikapada.m natthiiti na vattabba.m, tasmaa antamaso ``pakkana.m, takana.m'' iccevamaadiini bhaavavaacakaani naamikapadaani sabbaasu dhaatuusu yathaaraha.m labbhantiiti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ^b^taki kicchajiivane. kicchajiivana.m^eb^ kasirajiivana.m. ta"nkati. aata"nkati. aata"nko. ^b^aata"nko^eb^ti kicchajiivitakaro rogo, tathaa hi a.t.thakathaacariyaa ``appaabaadha.m appaata"nka''nti imasmi.m paa.lippadese iti attha.m sa.mva.n.nesu.m ^b^``aabaadho^eb^ti visabhaagavedanaa vuccati, yaa ekadese uppajjitvaa sakalasariira.m ayapa.t.tena bandhitvaa viya ga.nhaati. ^b^aata"nko^eb^ti kicchajiivitakaro rogo. atha vaa yaapetabbarogo aata"nko, itaro aabaadho. khuddako vaa rogo aata"nko, balavaa aabaadho. keci pana `ajjhattasamu.t.thaano aabaadho, bahiddhaasamu.t.thaano aata"nko'ti vadantii''ti.
[03] ^b^suka gatiya.m^eb^. sokati, suko, sukii. tatra ^b^suko^eb^ti suvo. sokati manaapena gamanena gacchatiiti suko. tassa bhariyaa sukii.

[03] ^b^bukka bhassane^eb^. idha ^b^bhassana.m^eb^ naama sunakhabhassana.m adhippeta.m ``sunakho bhassitvaa''ti ettha viya, na ``aavaaso gocara.m ^a^M0.0012^ea^ bhassa''ntiaadiisu viya. vacanasa"nkhaata.m bhassana.m, bukkati saa.

[03] ^b^aka ku.tilagatiya.m^eb^. akati. etaa ^b^ku^eb^aadikaa ^b^aka^eb^pariyantaa dhaatuyo parassa bhaasaati saddasatthaviduu vadanti. tesa.m mate etaa ``ti anti, tu antu'' iccaadiina.myeva visayo. paa.liya.m pana niyamo natthi, tasmaa na ta.m idha pamaa.na.m.

[03] ^b^i ajjhayane. ajjhayana.m^eb^ uccaara.na.m sikkhana.m vaa, ayati, adhiiyati, ajjhayati, adhiite, ajjhena.m, ajjhaayako. dibba.m adhiiyase maaya.m. adhiiyanti mahaaraaja, dibbamaayidha pa.n.ditaa. ajjhenamariyaa pathavi.m janindaa. tattha ^b^ajjhaayako^eb^ti ajjhayatiiti ajjhaayako, mante parivattetiiti attho.

[03] ^b^u sadde^eb^. avati, avanti. avasi. ettha ``yo aatumaana.m sayameva paavaa''ti paa.li ^b^pa^eb^pubbassa ^b^u^eb^dhaatussa payogoti da.t.thabbo. ^b^pa^eb^pubbassa ^b^vada^eb^dhaatussa ^b^da^eb^kaaralopappayogotipi vattu.m yujjati.
[03] ^b^va"nka ko.tille^eb^. va"nkati. va"nka.m. ^b^va"nka^eb^saddo hi ^b^vakka^eb^saddena samaanattho, ^b^vakka^eb^saddo ca ^b^va"nka^eb^saddena. tathaa hi --
[22] disaa bhajatha vakka"ngaa, jaata.m sara.nato bhaya''nti..

[07] paa.li ^a^M0.0013^ea^ dissati. aya.m pana ^b^vakka^eb^saddo sakka.tabhaasa.m patvaa ^b^ka^eb^kaarab^rab^kaarasa~n~nogakkhariko bhavati, dhaatubhaavo panassa poraa.nehi na vutto, tasmaa kriyaapada.m na di.t.tha.m. imassa pana ^b^va"nka^eb^saddassa ^b^``va"nka ko.tille^eb^''ti dhaatubhaavo vutto, ``va"nkatii''ti kriyaapada~nca, paa.liya.m tu ``va"nkatii''ti kriyaapada.m na di.t.tha.m, tathaa bhaavavaacako ^b^va"nka^eb^saddopi. vaaccali"ngo pana anekesu .thaanesu di.t.tho. tatta ^b^va"nkatii^eb^ti kriyaapada.m paa.liya.m avijjamaanampi gahetabbameva ^b^naathatii^eb^ti kriyaapadamiva. bhaavavaacakassa pana ^b^va"nka^eb^saddassa atthitaa natthitaa ca paa.liaadiisu punappuna.m upaparikkhitabbaa. kecettha vadeyyu.m ``yadi bhaavavaacako ^b^va"nka^eb^saddo natthi, katha.m `a.t.thava"nka.m ma.niratana.m u.laara'nti ettha samaaso''ti. ettha pana a.t.thasu .thaanesu va"nka.m ^b^a.t.thava"nka.m,^eb^ na a.t.thava"nkaani yassaati. dabbavaacako hi ^b^va"nka^eb^saddo, na bhaavavaacakoti da.t.thabba.m.
[22] ba.lise giribhede ca, vattate sa pumaa tadaa..
[03] aya~nhi ``te'me janaa va"nkaghastaa sayanti. yathaapi maccho ba.lisa.m, va"nka.m ma.msena chaadita.m. va"nkaghastova ambujo''tiaadiisu ba.lise vattati.

[03] ettha siyaa ``nanu ca bho `yathaapi maccho ba.lisa.m, va"nka.m ma.msena chaadita'nti ettha ^b^va"nka^eb^saddo gu.navaacako visesanasado, yena ba.liso visesito, tena va"nka.m ku.tila.m ba.lisanti attho vi~n~naayatii''ti? tanna, ^b^va"nka^eb^sadde avuttepi ba.lisasabhaavassa va"nkattaa ku.tilattho paaka.toti natthi visesanasaddena ^a^M0.0014^ea^ payojana.m. ida.m pana ``ba.lisa.m va"nka''nti vacana.m ``hatthi naago. saroruha.m paduma.m. hatthii ca ku~njaro naago''tiaadivacanamiva pariyaayavacana.m, tasmaa ``va"nka''nti padassa ``ku.tila''nti attho na gahetabbo. atha vaa yathaa ``yathaa aara~n~naka.m naaga.m, danti.m anveti hatthinii''ti ettha ^b^naaga^eb^saddassa ^b^dantii^eb^saddassa ca a~n~nama~n~napariyaa yavacanattepi ^b^danti^eb^nti manoramadantayuttanti attho sa.mva.n.nito, tathaa ``ba.lisa.m va"nka''nti imesampi a~n~nama~n~na.m pariyaayavacanattepi ^b^va"nka^eb^nti ku.tilanti attho vattabbo. eva~nhi sati attho saalaraajaa viya suphullito hoti, desanaa ca vilaasappattaa, na pana ``va"nka.m ba.lisa''nti saddaana.m gu.nagu.niivasena samaanaadhikara.nabhaavo icchitabbo ``buddho bhagavaa vera~njaaya.m viharatii''tiaadiisu ``buddho bhagavaa''ti imesa.m viya samaanaadhikara.nabhaavassa anicchitabbattaa. na hi iidisesu .thaanesu samaanaadhikara.nabhaavo poraa.nehi anumato.

[03] ``buddha.m buddha.m nikhilavisaya.m suddhiyaa yaava suddhi''nti ca aadiisu pana anumato. ettha hi ``etaadiso''ti ca ``appa.tipuggalo''ti ca ``tathaagato''ti ca ``balappatto''ti ca ``sambuddho''ti ca ``parinibbuto''ti ca imaani ``satthaa''ti anena padena samaanaadhikara.naani. tathaa ``buddha.m buddha''nti dvinna.m padaana.m pacchima.m purimena samaanaadhikara.na.m bhavati.

[03] iti ``yathaapi maccho ba.lisa.m, va"nka.m ma.msena chaadita''nti ettha ^b^va"nka^eb^saddo ba.lisassaabhidhaanantara.m, na gu.navaacako. eva.m ^b^va"nka^eb^saddo ba.lise vattati. ``ka"nka.m gacchaama pabbata.m. duure va"nkatapabbato''tiaadiisu ^a^M0.0015^ea^ pana girivisese vattati. ettha ca ``va"nkapabbato''ti vattabbe sukhuccaara.nattha.m niruttinayena majjhe animitta.m ^b^ta^eb^kaaraagama.m katvaa ``va"nkatapabbato''ti vutta.m. atha vaa va"nkoyeva va"nkataa, yathaa devo eva devataa. yathaa ca disaa eva disataati, eva.m ^b^taa^eb^paccayavasena va"nkataa ca saa pabbato caati ``va"nkatapabbato''ti vutta.m, majjhe rassavasena ceta.m da.t.thabba.m. atha vaa va"nkamassa sa.n.thaanamatthiiti va"nkatoti ^b^mantu^eb^atthe ^b^ta^eb^paccayo, yathaa pabbamassa atthiiti pabbatoti. eva.m va"nkato ca so pabbato caati va"nkatapabbato. ``va"nkapabbato'' icceva vaa pa.n.natti, paadakkharapaaripuuriyaa pana ``duure va"nkatapabbato''ti vuttanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ^b^loka dassane^eb^. lokati. loko. aalokoti a~n~naanipi ruupaani gahetabbaani. ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.na.m pana patvaa imissaa ``loketi, lokayati, oloketi, olokayatii''tiaadinaa ruupaani bhavanti. ^b^loko^eb^ti tayo lokaa sa"nkhaaraloko sattaloko okaasalokoti. tattha ``eko loko, sabbe sattaa aahaara.t.thitikaa''ti aagato sa"nkhaaro eva loko sa"nkhaaraloko. sattaa eva loko sattaloko. cakkavaa.lasa"nkhaato okaaso eva loko okaasaloko, yo ``bhaajanaloko''tipi vuccati. tesu sa"nkhaaro lujjatiiti lokoti. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa ``lujjati palujjatiiti kho bhikkhu tasmaa lokoti vuccatii''ti. lokiyati ettha pu~n~napaapa.m tabbipaako caati satto loko. lokiyati vicittaakaarato dissatiiti cakkavaa.lasa"nkhaato okaaso loko. yasmaa pana ^b^loka^eb^saddo samuuhepi dissati, tasmaa lokiyati samudaayavasena ^a^M0.0016^ea^ pa~n~naapiyatiiti loko, samuuhoti ayampi attho gahetabbo. atha vaa ^b^loko^eb^ti tayo lokaa kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyalokoti. tesa.m saruupa.m ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.ne kathessaama bahuvidhata~nca. bahiddhaa pana kaviihi ``loko tu bhuvane jane''ti ettakameva vutta.m.

[03] ^b^siloka sa"nghaate. sa"nghaato^eb^ pi.n.dana.m. silokati, siloko, silokamanukassaami. akkharapadaniyamito vacanasa"nghaato ^b^siloko^eb^. so pajjanti vuccati, tathaa hi ``siloko yasassi pajje''ti kavayo vadanti.
[03] ^b^deka dheka saddussaahesu. saddo^eb^ ravo, ^b^ussaaho^eb^ vaayaamo. dekati. dhekati.
[03] ^b^reka saki sa"nkaaya.m^eb^. rekati. sa"nkati, tasmi.m me sa"nkate mano. sa"nkaa.
[03] ^b^kata loliye^eb^. lolabhaavo ^b^loliya.m^eb^ yathaa dakkhiya.m. kakati, kaako, kaakii. ettha ``kaako, dha"nko, vaayaso, bali, bhoji, ari.t.tho''ti imaani kaakaabhidhaanaani.
[03] ^b^kuka vaka aadaane^eb^. kukati, vakati, koko, vako. ettha ^b^koko^eb^ti ara~n~nasunakho. ^b^vako^eb^ti khuddakavanadiipiko, byagghotipi vadanti.
[03] ^b^vaka dittiya.m pa.tighaate ca. ditti^eb^ sobhaa, vakati.

[03] ^b^kaki^eb^ ^a^M0.0017^ea^ ^b^vaki sakka tika .tika seka^eb^ gatyatthaa. ka"nkati, va"nkati, sakkati, nisakkati, parisakkati, osakkati, vadhaaya parisakkana.m. bi.laaranisakkamattampi. tekati, .tekati, .tiikaa sekati. ettha ^b^.tiikaa^eb^ti .tikiyati jaaniyati sa.mva.n.nanaaya attho etaayaati .tiikaa. etaa ^b^i^eb^dhaatuaadikaa ^b^seka^eb^pariyantaa dhaatuyo ^b^``attanobhaasaa''^eb^ti saddasatthaviduu vadanti. tesa.m mate etaa ``te ante, ta.m anta.m''iccaadiina.myeva visayo, paavacane pana niyamo natthi.

[03] ^b^hikka abyattasadde. abyattasaddo^eb^ avibhaavitatthasaddo niratthakasaddo ca. hikkati, hikkate. ima.m ^b^``ubhayatobhaasaa''^eb^ti vadanti. ida.m tu paavacanena sa.msandati. parassattanobhaasaana~nhi dhaatuuna.m ``bhavati, bhavate, baadhate, baadhatii''tiaadinaa yebhuyyena dvidhaa dvidhaa ruupaani saasane dissanti.

[03] ^b^khaa pakathane khyaa^eb^ ca. ^b^pakathana.m^eb^ aacikkhana.m desana.m vaa. khaati, sa"nkhaati. ^b^aa^eb^pubbatte visadisabhaavena ^b^khaa^eb^tyakkharassa dvitta.m, ^b^aa^eb^kaarassa ca sa~n~nogapubbattaa rassatta.m, akkhaati. akkhaasi purisuttamo. akkheyya.m te aha.m ayye. dhammo sa"nkhaayati. akkhaayati. atra pana ^b^ka^eb^kaaralopo. svaakhaato bhagavataa dhammo. sa"nkhaato. akkhaato. akkhaataaro tathaagataa. sa"nkhaataa sabbadhammaana.m vidhuro. sa"nkhaa, pa.tisa"nkhaa. kriya.m aakyaati kathetiiti aakhyaata.m. keci ^a^M0.0018^ea^ pana ``svaakhaato''ti ca ``svaakkhyaato''ti ca ``svaakhyaato''ti ca padamicchanti. tattha pacchimaani sakka.tabhaasaato naya.m gahetvaa vuttaani, itara.m yathaa.thitaruupanipphattivasena, ato yathaadassitapadaaniyeva pasatthataraani. tattha ^b^sa"nkhaa^eb^saddassa atthuddhaaro niiyate -- ^b^sa"nkhaa^eb^saddo ~naa.nako.t.thaasapa~n~nattiga.nanaasu dissati. ``sa"nkhaayeka.m pa.tisevatii''tiaadiisu hi ~naa.ne dissati. ``papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacarantii''tiaadiisu ko.t.thaase. ``tesa.m tesa.m dhammaana.m sa"nkhaa sama~n~naa''tiaadiisu pa~n~nattiya.m. ``na sukara.m sa"nkhaatu''ntiaadiisu ga.nanaaya.m. ettheta.m vuccati --

[03] ^b^khi khaye^eb^. khiyanadhamma.m khiiyati. saasanaanuruupena sare ^b^i^eb^kaarassa ^b^iyyaa^eb^deso, khiyyati. ``khayo, kha.m'' iccapi ruupaani ~neyyaani. tattha ^b^khayo^eb^ti khiyana.m khayo. atha vaa khiyanti kilesaa etthaati khayo, magganibbaanaani. khayasa"nkhaatena maggena paapu.niyattaa phalampi khayo. ^b^kha^eb^nti tuccha.m su~n~na.m vivitta.m ritta.m, ^b^kha^eb^nti vaa aakaaso.

[03] ^b^khi nivaase^eb^. khiiyati, khiyyati vaa. saasanaanuruupena ^b^i^eb^kaarassa ^b^iiya iyyaa^eb^deso da.t.thabbo. aya.m ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.nepi pakkhipitabbo. kha.m khaya.m. abhirama.niiya.m raajakkhaya.m. tattha ^b^khiiyatii^eb^ti nivasati. ^b^kha^eb^nti cakkhaadiindriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.naadiina.m nivaasa.t.thena. ^b^khaya^eb^nti nivesana.m. ^b^raajakkhaya^eb^nti ra~n~no nivesana.m. atraaya.m paa.li --

[03] ^b^khe khaadanasattaasu^eb^. khaayati. unduuraa khaayanti. vikkhaayitaka.m. gokhaayitaka.m. assirii viya khaayati. disaapi me na pakkhaayanti. etthaadimhi ^b^kaayatii^eb^ti khaadati. atha vaa upa.t.thaati pa~n~naayati.

[03] ^b^sukha dukkha takriyaaya.m. takriyaa^eb^ti sukhadukkhaana.m vedanaana.m kriyaa, sukhana.m dukkhananti vutta.m hoti. akammakaa ime dhaatavo. sukhati, dukkhati. sukha.m, dukkha.m. sukhito, dukkhito. sukha.m saata.m pii.nana.m, dukkha.m vighaata.m agha.m kileso. tattha ^b^sukha^eb^nti sukhayatiiti sukha.m. yassuppajjati, ta.m sukhita.m karotiiti attho. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti dukkhayatiiti dukkha.m. yassuppajjati, ta.m dukkhita.m karotiiti attho. imaani nibbacanaani kaaritavasena vuttaaniiti da.t.thabba.m ^b^a.t.thakathaaya.m sukhadukkha^eb^saddattha.m vadantehi garuuhi ^b^sukhayati dukkhayati^eb^saddaana.m kammatthamaadaaya vivara.nassa katattaa. tathaa hi ``sukheti sukhayati, sukhaapeti sukhaapayati, dukkheti dukkhayati, dukkhaapeti dukkhaapayatii''ti imaani tesa.m kaaritapadaruupaani, attaana.m sukheti pii.netiiti ca, sukhayati sukha.m, dukkhayatiiti dukkhanti ca,

[07] paa.liaadidassanato. saddasatthe pana dhaatupaa.thasa"nkhepe ca ime dhaatavo ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.neyeva vuttaa. ``sukhayati dukkhayatii''ti ca akaaritaani suddhakattupadaani icchitaani. maya.m tu tesa.m tabbacana.m suddhakattari ca taani padaruupaani na icchaama paa.liaadiihi viruddhattaa, tasmaayeva te imasmi.m ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.ne vuttaa. aya~nhi suddhakattuvisaye asmaaka.m ruci ``sukhatiiti sukhito, dukkhatiiti dukkhito''ti.

[03] nanu ca bho ``sukhati dukkhatii''ti kriyaapadaani buddhavacane na dissantiiti? sacca.m, eva.m santepi a.t.thakathaanayavasena gahetabbattaa dissantiyeva naama. na hi sabbathaa sabbesa.m dhaatuuna.m ruupaani saasane loke vaa labbhanti, ekaccaani pana labbhanti, ekaccaani na labbhanti. eva.m santepi nayavasena labbhantiyeva. ``kappayavho patissataa''ti hi di.t.the ``caravho bhu~njavho''tiaadiinipi nayavasena di.t.thaaniyeva naama.

[03] tatra panaaya.m nayo. ^b^visuddhimaggaa^eb^diisu hi ``ekadviyojanamattampi addhaana.m gatassa vaayo kuppati, gattaani dukkhantii''ti eva.m ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.nika.m akammaka.m suddhakattuvaacaka.m ``dukkhantii''ti kriyaapada.m dissati. tasmi.m di.t.thiyeva ``sukhati, sukhanti. sukhasi, sukhatha. sukhaami, sukhaamaa''tiaadiini ca ``dukkhati, dukkhanti. dukkhasi, dukkhathaa''tiaadiinica di.t.thaani naama honti di.t.thena adi.t.thassa taadisassa anavajjassa nayassa gahetabbattaa, tasmaa ``sukhatiiti sukhito, dukkhatiiti dukkhito''ti ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^nayo eva gahetabbo, na pana ^b^curaadi^eb^nayo. aparampettha nibbacana.m, sukha.m sa~njaata.m ^a^M0.0021^ea^ etassaati ^b^sukhito,^eb^ sa~njaatasukhoti attho. esa nayo ^b^dukkhito^eb^ti etthaapi. atha vaa sukhena ito pavattoti sukhito. esa nayo ``dukkhito''ti etthaapi. dullabhaaya.m niiti saadhuka.m manasi kaatabbaa.

[03] ^b^mokkha muccane^eb^. akammakoya.m dhaatu. mokkhati. mokkho. paatimokkho. kaarite ``mokkheti, mokkhayati, mokkhaapeti, mokkhaapayatii''ti ruupaani. keci panima.m ^b^``mokkha mocane''^eb^ti pa.thitvaa ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.ne pakkhipanti. tesa.m mate ``mokkheti, mokkhayatii''ti suddhakattupadaani bhavanti. etaani paa.liyaa a.t.thakathaaya ca virujjhanti. tathaa hi ``mokkhanti maarabandhanaa. na me sama.ne mokkhasi. mahaaya~n~na.m yajissaama, eva.m mokkhaama paapakaa''ti paa.liyaa virujjhanti. ``yo na.m paati rakkhati, ta.m mokkheti moceti aapaayikaadiihi dukkhehiiti ^b^paatimokkho''^eb^ti a.t.thakathaaya ca virujjhanti, tasmaa paa.liya.m ``mokkhesi mokkhemaa''ti ca avatvaa ``mokkhasi, mokkhaamaa''ti suddhakattuvaacaka.m vutta.m, ta~nca kho apaadaanavisaya.m katvaa. ^b^a.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ pana ``mokkheti, mocetii''ti hetukattuvaacaka.m vutta.m, tampi apaadaanavisaya.myeva katvaa. eva.m imassa dhaatuno suddhakattuvisaye akammakabhaavo vidito, hetukattuvisaye ekakammakabhaavo vidito ^b^muca paca chidaa^eb^dayo viya. ^b^mokkha^eb^dhaatu dviga.nikoti ce? na, anekesu saa.t.thakathesu paa.lippadesesu ``mokkheti, mokkhayatii''ti suddhakatturuupaana.m adassanatoti da.t.thabba.m.
[03] ^b^okha raakha laakha daakha dhaakha sosanaalamatthesu^eb^. okhati. raakhati. laakhati. daakhati. dhaakhati.
[03] ^b^ukha nakha makha rakha lakha rakhi lakhi ikhi rikhi gatyatthaa^eb^. ukhati. nakhati. makhati. rakhati. lakhati. ra"nkhati. la"nkhati. i"nkhati. ri"nkhati.
[03] ^b^rakkha paalane^eb^. rakkhati. rakkhaa, rakkha.na.m, siila.m rakkhito devadatto, siila.m rakkhita.m devadattena, siila.m rakkhako devadatto.

[03]b^nakkha gatiya.mb^. nakkhati. nakkhatta.m. ettha ^b^nakkhatta^eb^nti etto ito caati visamagatiyaa agantvaa attano viithiyaava gamanena nakkhana.m gamana.m taayati rakkhatiiti nakkhatta.m. poraa.naa pana ``nakkharanti na nassantiiti ^b^nakkhattaanii''^eb^ti kathayi.msu. ``nakkhatta.m, joti, nirikkha.m, bha.m'' iccete pariyaayaa.

[03] ^b^kakhi vakhi makhi ka"nkhaaya.m^eb^. satthari ka"nkhati. va"nkhati, ma"nkhati. ``ka"nkhaa ka"nkhaayanaa ka"nkhaayitatta.m vimati vicikicchaa dve.lhaka.m dvedhaapatho sa.msayo aneka.msagaaho aasappanaa parisappanaa apariyogaahanaa thambhitatta.m cittassa manovilekho'' iccete ka"nkhaapariyaayaa. etesu pana --
[03] ^b^kakhi iccaaya.m^eb^. dhana.m ka"nkhati, abhika"nkhati, naabhika"nkhaami mara.na.m. abhika"nkhita.m dhana.m.

[03] ^b^likha lekhane^eb^. likhati, sallekhati. atisallekhatevaaya.m sama.no. lekhaa, lekhana.m, lekhako, likhita.m, sallekhapa.tipatti, etaa ^b^dakhi^eb^aadikaa ^b^likha^eb^pariyantaa ^b^``parassabhaasaa''^eb^ti saddasatthaviduu vadanti.
[03] ^b^dhukkha dhikkha sandiipanakilesanajiivanesu^eb^. dhukkhati. dhikkhati. saddasatthaviduu pana ``dhukkhate dhikkhate''ti ^b^attanobhaasa.m^eb^ vadanti. tathaa ito paraani ruupaanipi.

[03] ^b^rukkha vakkha vara.ne. vara.na.m^eb^ sa.mvara.na.m. rukkhati. vakkhati. rukkho, vakkho. ettha ca ^b^vakkho^eb^ti rukkhoyeva. tathaa hi ``saaduuni rama.niiyaani, santi vakkhaa ara~n~najaa''ti jaatakapaa.tho dissati. imaani pana rukkhassa naamaani --
[27] ago nago kujo saakhii, saalo ca vi.tapii taru.
[22] dumo phalii tu phalavaa, gaccho tu khuddapaadapo''ti..

[03] kecettha vadeyyu.m ``nanu ca ^b^saala^eb^saddena saalarukkhoyeva vutto, naa~n~no `saalaa phandanamaaluvaa'ti payogadassanato, atha kimattha.m ^b^saala^eb^saddena yo koci rukkho ^a^M0.0024^ea^ vutto''ti? na saalarukkhoyeva ^b^saala^eb^saddena vutto, atha kho saalarukkhepi vanappatije.t.tharukkhepi yasmi.m kasmi~nci rukkhepi ``saalo''ti vohaarassa dassanato a~n~nepi rukkhaa vuttaa. tathaa hi saalarukkhopi ``saalo''ti vuccati. yathaaha ``seyyathaapi bhikkhave gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure mahanta.m saalavana.m, ta~ncassa ela.n.dehi sa~nchanna.m. antarena yamakasaalaana''nti. vanappatije.t.tharukkhopi. yathaaha --
[03] yo koci rukkhopi. yathaaha ``atha kho ta.m bhikkhave maaluvabiija.m a~n~natarasmi.m saalamuule nipateyyaa''ti. atrida.m vuccati --

[03] ^b^sikkha vijjopaadaane^eb^. sikkhati. sikkhaa, sikkhana.m, sikkhita.m sippa.m, sikkhako, sikkhito, sekkho, asekkho. ^b^ka^eb^kaaralope ``sekho asekho''ti ruupaani bhavanti. tattha ^b^sikkhito^eb^ti sa~njaatasikkho, asikkhiiti vaa sikkhito, tathaa hi kattuppayogo dissati ``aha.m kho pana susikkhito anavayo sake aacariyake kumbhakaarakamme''ti.

[03] ^b^bhikkha yaacane^eb^. bhikkhati. bhikkhu, bhikkhaa, bhikkhana.m, bhikkhako, bhikkhita.m bhojana.m. ettha pana ``bhikkhu yati sama.no muni pabbajito ^a^M0.0025^ea^ anagaaro tapassii tapodhano'' iccetaani pariyaayavacanaani. etesu saasane ``bhikkhuu''ti upasampanno vuccati. kadaaci pana ``bhikkhusata.m bhojesi, bhikkhusahassa.m bhojesii''tiaadiisu saama.nerepiupaadaaya ``bhikkhuu''ti vohaaro pavattati, taapasaapi ca ^b^sama.na^eb^saddaadiihi vuccanti, ``ahuu atiitamaddhaane, sama.no khantidiipano''tiaadi ettha nidassana.m.

[03] ^b^dakkha vuddhiya.m siighatte ca^eb^. dakkhati, dakkhi.naa, dakkho. dakkhanti vaddhanti sattaa etaaya yathaadhippetaahi sampattiihi iddhaa vuddhaa ukka.msagataa hontiiti ^b^dakkhi.naa,^eb^ daatabbavatthu. dakkhati kusalakamme a~n~nasmi~nca kiccaakicce adandhataaya siigha.m gacchatiiti ^b^dakkho,^eb^ cheko, yo ``kusalo''tipi vuccati.

[03] ^b^dikkha mu.n.diopanayananiyamabbataadesesu. dikkha^eb^dhaatu mu.n.diye, upanayane, niyame, vate, aadese ca pavattati. dikkhati. dikkhito mu.n.do. ettha siyaa -- nanu ca bho ^b^sarabha"ngajaatake^eb^ ``gandho isiina.m ciradikkhitaana.m, kaayaa cuto gacchati maalutenaa''ti etasmi.m padese a.t.thakathaacariyehi ^b^``ciradikkhitaana^eb^nti cirapabbajitaana''nti vutta.m. na hi tattha ``ciramu.n.daana''nti vutta.m. eva.m sante kasmaa idha ^b^``dikkha^eb^dhaatu mu.n.diye vuttaa''ti? sacca.m, tattha pana ^b^dikkhita^eb^saddassa pabbajite vattanato ``cirapabbajitaana''nti vutta.m, na dhaatuatthassa vibhaavanattha.m. ida pana dhaatuatthavibhaavanattha.m mu.n.diye vuttaa. taapasaa hi mu.n.diyatthavaacakena ^b^dikkhita^eb^saddena vattu.m yuttaa. tathaa hi a.t.thakathaacariyehi ^b^cakkavattisuttatthava.n.nanaaya.m^eb^ ``kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa''ti imissaa paa.liyaa atthavivara.ne ``taapasapabbajja.m pabbajantaapi hi pa.thama.m kesamassu.m ohaarenti, tato pa.t.thaaya paruu.lhakese ^a^M0.0026^ea^ bandhitvaa vivaranti, tena vutta.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa''ti eva.m attho sa.mva.n.nito.
[03] ^b^ikkha dassana"nkesu^eb^. ikkhati, upekkhati, apekkhati. upekkhaa, apekkhaa, paccavekkha.naa. ^b^ka^eb^kaaralope ``upekhaa, apekhaa, upasampadaapekho''ti ruupaani bhavanti.

[03] ^b^cikkha cakkha viyattiya.m vaacaaya.m^eb^. cikkhati, aacikkhati, abbhaacikkhati. aacikkhako. cakkhati, cakkhu. ettha ^b^cakkhuu^eb^ti cakkhatiiti cakkhu, samavisama.m abhibyatta.m vadanta.m viya hotiiti attho. atha vaa ``suupa.m cakkhati, madhu.m cakkhatii''tiaadiisu viya yasmaa assaadatthopi ^b^cakkhu^eb^saddo bhavati, tasmaa ``cakkhati vi~n~naa.naadhi.t.thita.m ruupa.m assaadenta.m viya hotii''ti assaadatthopi gahetabbo. ``cakkhu.m kho maaga.n.diya.m ruupaaraama.m ruuparata.m ruupasammudita''nti hi vutta.m. satipi sotaadiina.m saddaaraamataadibhaave niruu.lhattaa nayane eva ^b^cakkhu^eb^saddo pavattati ^b^pa"nkajaa^eb^disaddaa viya padumaadiisu.
[03] ^b^gu kariisussagge. kariisussaggo^eb^ vaccakara.na.m. gavati. ^b^ge sadde^eb^. gaayati. giita.m.

[03] ^b^vagga^eb^ ^a^M0.0027^ea^ gatiya.m. vaggati. vaggo, vaggita.m. ettha samudaayavasena vaggana.m pavattana.m ^b^vaggo. vaggita^eb^nti gamana.m. tathaa hi ^b^naagapetavatthua.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ ``yo so majjhe assatariirathena catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena. amhaaka.m putto ahu majjhimo so, amaccharii daanapatii virocatii''ti imissaa paa.liyaa attha.m vadantehi ^b^``suvaggitenaa^eb^ti sundaragamanenaa''ti. ki~nci bhiyyo kriyaapadampi ca di.t.tha.m ``dhunanti vagganti pavattanti cambare''ti.

[03] ^b^ragi lagi agi vagi magi igi rigi ligi tagi sagi gamane ca. ca^eb^kaaro gatipekkhako. ra"ngati. ra"ngo. la"ngati. la"ngo, la"ngii. a"ngati, a"ngeti. a"ngo, sama"ngii, sama"ngitaa, a"nga.m, a"nga.na.m. va"ngati. va"ngo. ma"ngati. ma"ngo, upa"ngo, ma"ngala.m. i"ngati. i"ngita.m. ri"ngati. ri"ngana.m. li"ngati. li"ngana.m. ulli"ngati, ulli"ngana.m. ta"ngati. ta"ngana.m. sa"ngati. sa"ngana.m. tattha ^b^a"nga^eb^nti yesa.m kesa~nci vatthuuna.m avayavo, sariirampi kaara.nampi ca vuccati. ^b^a"nga.na^eb^nti katthaci kilesaa vuccanti ``raago a"nga.na''ntiaadiisu. raagaadayo hi a"nganti etehi ta.msama"ngipuggalaa nihiinabhaava.m gacchantiiti ^b^``a"nga.naanii''^eb^ti vuccanti. katthaci mala.m vaa pa"nko vaa ``tasseva rajassa vaa a"nga.nassa vaa pahaanaaya vaayamatii''tiaadiisu. a~njati makkhetiiti hi a"nga.na.m, malaadi. katthaci tathaaruupo viva.tappadeso ``cetiya"nga.na.m, bodhiya"nga.na''ntiaadiisu. a~njati tattha .thita.m atisundarataaya abhibya~njetiiti hi a"nga.na.m, viva.to bhuumippadeso. icceva.m --
[03] ^b^laga sa"ngeca. ca^eb^ kaaro anantaravuttaapekkhako. lagati. ca jato na hoti lagana.m. ba.lise laggo.
[03] ^b^agga ku.tilagatiya.m^eb^. aggatiiti aggi, ku.tila.m gacchatiiti attho.
[21] aggi dhuumasikho joti, jaatavedo sikhii gini.
[03] ^b^gu uggame. uggamo^eb^ uggamana.m paaka.tataa. gavati. saddasatthaviduu panimaasa.m ``gaate gavate''ti ^b^attanobhaasatta.m^eb^ vadanti.

[03] ^b^ghaa gandhopaadaane^eb^. ghaati. ghaana.m. gandha.m ghatvaa. atraaya.m paa.li ``gandha.m ghatvaa sati mu.t.thaa''ti. etissaa pana ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.na.m pattaaya ``ghaayati ghaayitvaa''ti ruupaani bhavanti.
[03] ^b^jaggha hasane^eb^. jagghati, sa~njagghati. sa~njagghittho mayaa saha. jagghitumpi na sobhati. jagghitvaa.
[03] ^b^sighi aaghaane. aaghaana.m^eb^ ghaanena gandhaanubhavana.m. si"nghati, upasi"nghati. upasi"nghitvaa. aaraa si"nghaami vaarija.m. etaa ^b^``parassabhaasaa''^eb^ti saddasatthaviduu vadanti.
[03] ^b^raghi laghi gatyakkhepe. gatyakkhepo^eb^ gatiyaa akkhepo. ra"nghati, la"nghati, ulla"nghati. la"nghitaa, ulla"nghikaapiiti, la"nghitvaa.
[03] ^b^daagha aayaase ca. aayaaso^eb^ kilamana.m. ^b^ca^eb^kaaro saamatthiyaapekkhako. daaghati. nidaagho.
[03] ^b^silaagha katthane. katthana.m^eb^ pasa.msana.m. silaaghati. silaaghaa. buddhassa silaaghate. silaaghitvaa. ^b^``attanobhaasaa''^eb^ti saddasatthaviduu vadanti.
[03] ^b^suca soke^eb^. socati. soko, socanaa, soca.m, socanto, socantii, socanta.m kula.m, socitvaa.
[03] ^b^kuca sadde taare. taarasaddo^eb^ accuccasaddo. kocati. uccasadda.m karotiiti attho.
[03] ^b^a~ncu gatipuujanaasu^eb^. magga.m a~ncati. buddha.m a~ncati. uddha.m anuggantvaa tiriya.m a~ncitoti tiracchaano. ka.tuka~ncukataa.
[03] ^b^va~ncu ca~ncu ta~ncu gatiya.m^eb^. va~ncati. ca~ncati. ta~ncati. ma~ncati. santi paadaa ava~ncanaa. ^b^ava~ncanaa^eb^ti va~ncitu.m gantu.m asamatthaa.
[03] ^b^gucu ga.necu theyyakara.ne^eb^. thenana.m theyya.m, corikaa. tassa kriyaa ^b^theyyakara.na.m^eb^. gocati. ga.necati.

[03] ^b^vaca viyattiya.m vaacaaya.m^eb^. viyattassa esaa viyatti, tissa.m viyattiya.m vaacaaya.m, viyattaaya.m vaacaayanti adhippaayo. viyattassa hi vadato puggalassa vasena vaacaa viyattaa naama vuccati. yathaa pana kucchisaddatiracchaanagataadisaddo ``abyattasaddo''ti vuccati, na eva.m vacanasa"nkhaato saddo ``abyattasaddo''ti vuccati vi~n~naatatthattaa. ``vatti, vacati, vacanti. vacasi'' iccaadiini suddhakattupadaani. ``vaaceti, vaacenti'' iccaadiini hetukattupadaani. ``atthaabhisamayaa dhiiro, pa.n.ditoti pavuccati. vuccanti. santo sappurisaa loke, devadhammaati vuccare'' iccaadiini kammapadaani. garuu pana ^b^va^eb^kaarassa ^b^u^eb^kaaraadesavasena ^b^``utta.m uccate uccante''^eb^tiaadiini icchanti, taani saasane appasiddhaani, sakka.tabhaasaanulomaani. saasanasmi~nhi ^b^ra^eb^kaaraagamavisaye ^b^ni^eb^pubbasseva vacassa ^b^va^eb^ssa ^b^u^eb^kaaraadeso siddho ^b^``nirutti, nirutta.m,^eb^ nerutta''nti. vacana.m, vaacaa, vaco, vacii, vutta.m, pavutta.m, vuccamaana.m, adhivacana.m, vattabba.m, vacaniiya.m, imaani naamikapadaani. vattu.m, vattave, vatvaa, vatvaana, imaani ^b^tu^eb^mantaadiini ^b^``parassabhaasaa''^eb^ti saddasatthaviduu vadanti.

[03] tattha ^b^vattii^eb^ti vadati. aakhyaatapada~nheta.m. atthasa.mva.n.nakehipi ``vatti etaayaati vaacaa''ti nibbacanamudaaha.ta.m. saddasatthe ca taadisa.m aakhyaatapada.m di.t.tha.m. ettha paneke vadanti ``vacati, vacantiitiaadiini kriyaapadaruupaani buddhavacane a.t.thakathaa.tiikaasu satthesu ca anaagatattaa cha.d.detabbaanii''ti. tanna, yasmaa saasane ``avaca, avaci.msuu''ti suddhakattupadaani ca ``vaaceti, vaacentii''tiaadiini hetukattupadaani ca dissanti, tasmaa ^a^M0.0032^ea^ buddhavacanaadiisu anaagataanipi ``vacati, vacantii''tiaadiini ruupaani gahetabbaani. vaceyya, vuccatu, vucceyya. sesa.m sabba.m sabbattha vitthaarato gahetabba.m.
[03] parokkhaaruupaani vadaama -- vaca, vacu. vace, vacittha. vaca.m, vacimha. vacittha, vacire. vacittho, vacivho. vaci.m, vacimhe.
[03] hiyyattaniiruupaani vadaama -- avacaa, avacuu. avaco, avacuttha. avoca.m, avacumha. avacuttha, avacutthu.m. avacase, avacuvha.m. avaci.m, avacamhase.
[03] ajjataniiruupaani vadaama -- avaci, avocu.m, avaci.msu. avoco, avocuttha. avoci.m, avocumha. avocaa, avocu. avacase, avociva.m. avoca.m, avocimhe.
[03] bhavissantiiruupaani vadaama -- vakkhati, vakkhanti. vakkhasi, vakkhatha. vakkhaami, vakkhaama. vakkhate, vakkhante. vakkhase, vakkhavhe. vakkhassa.m vakkhamhe.

[03] imesa.m pana padaana.m ``kathessati, kathessantii''tiaadinaa attho vattabbo. ^b^vakkha rose^eb^ti dhaatussa ca ``vakkhati, vakkhanti. vakkhasii''tiaadiini vatvaa avasaane uttamapurisekavacana.t.thaane ``vakkhemii''ti vattabba.m. attho panimesa.m ``rosati, rosantii''tiaadinaa vattabbo. aya.m ^b^vacavakkha^eb^dhaatuuna.m bhavissantiivattamaanaavasena ruupasa.msandanaanayo. aparaanipi ^b^vaca^eb^dhaatussa bhavissantii sahitaani ruupaani bhavanti -- vakkhissati, vakkhissanti. vakkhissasi, vakkhissatha. vakkhissaami, vakkhissaama. vakkhissate, vakkhissante. vakkhissase, vakkhissavhe. vakkhissa.m, vakkhissaamhe.
[22] imamhi kappe carita.m, pavakkhissa.m su.nohi me''ti..

[03] gadratapa~nhepi ^a^M0.0033^ea^ ``raajaa tumhehi saddhi.m pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa gahapati patiruupa.m aasana.m ~natvaa nisiidathaati vakkhissatii''ti evamaadia.t.thakathaapaa.tho dissati, tasmaayeva edisii padamaalaa racitaa. ^b^vakkha rose^eb^ti dhaatussapi bhavissantiisahitaani ruupaani ``vakkhissati, vakkhissantii''tiaadiini bhavanti. attho panimesa.m ``rosissati, rosissantii''tiaadinaa vattabbo. aya.m ^b^vacavakkha^eb^dhaatuuna.m bhavissantiivaseneva ruupasa.msandanaanayo.
[03] avacissaa, vacissaa, avacissa.msu, vacissa.msu. sesa.m sabba.m neyya.m. idha pana ^b^vutta^eb^saddassa atthuddhaara.m vattabbampi avatvaa upariyeva kathessaama ito ativiya vattabba.t.thaanattaa.
[03] ^b^cu cavane^eb^. cavati. kaarite ``caavetii''ti ruupa.m. devakaayaa cuto. cuta.m paduma.m. cavitu.m, cavitvaa.

[03] ^b^maca muci kakkane. kakkana.m^eb^ sariire ubba.t.tana.m. macati. mu~ncati. ^b^maci dhaara.nucchaayapuujanesu^eb^. dhaara.na.m ucchaayo puujananti tayo atthaa. tattha ^b^ucchaayo^eb^ malahara.na.m. ma~ncati. ma~nco, ma~ncana.m. ma~ncati puggala.m dhaaretiiti ma~nco.
[03] ^b^paca byattikara.ne^eb^. pacati. paako, paripaako, vipaako, pakka.m phala.m.

[03] ^b^ruca^eb^ ^a^M0.0034^ea^ ^b^dittiya.m rocane ca. ditti^eb^ sobhaa. ^b^rocana.m^eb^ ruci. rocati. verocano. sama.nassa rocate sacca.m. tassa te saggakaamassa, ekattamuparocita.m. aya~nca ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.ne ruciattha.m gahetvaa ``ruccatii''ti ruupa.m janeti. tena ``gamana.m mayha ruccatii''ti paa.li dissati. ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.ne pana ruciattha.m gahetvaa ``roceti rocayatii''ti ruupaani janeti. tena ``ki.m nu jaati.m na rocesii''tiaadikaa paa.liyo dissanti. tega.nikoya.m dhaatu.
[03] ^b^paca sa.mpaake^eb^. pacati, pacanti. saddasatthaviduu pana ^b^``attanobhaasaa''^eb^ti vadanti.

[03] ^b^yaaca yaacanaaya.m^eb^. braahma.no naaga.m ma.ni.m yaacati. naago ma.ni.m yaacito braahma.nena. te ta.m asse ayaacisu.m. so ta.m rathamayaacatha. devadatta.m aayaacati. eva.m suddhakattari ruupaani bhavanti. braahma.no braahma.nena naaga.m ma.ni.m yaaceti, yaacayati, yaacaapeti, yaacaapayati. eva.m hetukattari. raajaa braahma.nena dhana.m yaaciyati, yaacayiyati, yaacaapiyati, yaacaapayiyati. eva.m kammani. yaaca.m, yaacanto, yaacantii, yaacanta.m kula.m. yaacamaano, yaacamaanaa, yaacamaana.m kula.m. yaacako, yaacanaa, yaacitabba.m, yaacitu.m, yaacitvaana, yaacituna, yaaciya, yaaciyaana. eva.m naamikapadaani ^b^tu^eb^mantaadiini ca bhavanti.

[03] ^b^paca paake^eb^. odana.m pacati. ^b^``ubhayatobhaasaa''^eb^ti saddasatthaviduu vadanti. yathaa pana saasane ``pa.n.ditoti pavuccatii''ti ^a^M0.0035^ea^ ^b^vaca^eb^dhaatussa kammani ruupa.m pasiddha.m, na tathaa ^b^paca^eb^dhaatussa. eva.m santepi garuu ``tayaa paccate odano''ti tassa kammani ruupa.m vadanti. saasane pana avisesato ``paccate''ti vaa ``paccatii''ti vaa vuttassapi padassa akammakoyeva divaadiga.niko payogo icchitabbo ``devadatto niraye paccati. yaava paapa.m na paccatii''tiaadidassanato. kecettha vadeyyu.m ``sayameva piiyate paaniiyantiaadi viya ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.napakkhiko kammakattuppayogo esa, tasmaa `sayamevaa'ti pada.m ajjhaaharitvaa `sayameva devadatto paccatii'tiaadinaa attho vattabbo''ti tanna, ``sayameva piiyate paaniiya''nti ettha hi paaniiya.m manussaa pivanti, na paaniiya.m paaniiya.m pivati. manusseheva ta.m piiyate, na saya.m. eva.m parassa paanakriya.m pa.ticca kammabhuutampi ta.m sukarapaanakriyaavasena sukarattaa attanaava sijjhanta.m viya hotiiti ``sayameva piiyate paaniiya''nti ruu.lhiyaa payogo kato.

[03] ``sayameva ka.to kariyate''ti etthaapi ka.ta.m manussaa karonti, na ka.ta.m ka.to karoti. manusseheva ka.to kariyate, na saya.m. eva.m parassa kara.nakriya.m pa.ticca kammabhuutopi so sukara.na kriyaavasena sukarattaa attanaava sijjhanto viya hotiiti ``sayameva ka.to kariyate''ti ruu.lhiyaa payogo kato.

[03] ettha yathaa ^b^saya.m^eb^saddo paaniiya.m paaniiyeneva piiyate, na amhehi. ka.to ka.teneva kariyate, na amhehiiti sakammakavisayattaa payogaana.m a~n~nassa kriyaapa.tisedhanasa"nkhaata.m atthavisesa.m vadati, na tathaa ``devadatto niraye paccati, kamma.m paccatii''tiaadiisu tumhehi ajjhaaharito ^b^saya.m^eb^saddo atthavisesa.m vadati akammakavisayattaa etesa.m payogaana.m. eva.m ^a^M0.0036^ea^ ``devadatto''tiaadikassa paccattavacanassa akammakakattuvaacakattaa kammarahitasuddhakattuvaacakattaa ca ``paccatii''ti ida.m ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.nikaruupanti da.t.thabba.m. ^b^paca^eb^dhaatu saddasatthe ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.na vutto natthiiti ce? natthi vaa atthi vaa, kimettha saddasattha.m karissati, paa.li eva pamaa.na.m, tasmaa maya.m lokavohaarakusalassa bhagavato paa.linaya~n~neva gahetvaa ima.m ^b^paca^eb^dhaatu.m ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.nepi pakkhipissaama. tathaa hi ^b^dhammapaalaacariya anuruddhaacariyaa^eb^diihi abhisa"nkhataa ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.nikappayogaa dissanti ---
[22] pacchaa paccati paakaana.m, pavatte a.t.thake duve..

[07] iccevamaadayo. ettha pana tesa.m idameva paa.liyaa na sameti. ye ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.namhi sakammakabhaavena ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.ne ca akammakabhaavena pavattassa ^b^bhuu^eb^dhaatusseva ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.ne pavattassa sakamakassapi sato ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.na.m patvaa akammakabhuutassa ^b^paca^eb^dhaatussa sakammakattamicchanti. eta~nhi saa.t.thakathe tepi.take buddhavacane kuto labbhaa, tasmaa bhagavato paavacane sotuuna.m sa.msayasamugghaa.tattha.m ettha ima.m niiti.m pa.t.thapema --

[03] puriso odana.m pacati. sa bhuutapacani.m paci. odano paccati. kamma.m paccati. viihisiisa.m paccati. rukkhaphalaani paccanti. naago paakaara.m bhindati. ta.laakapaa.li bhijjati. bhijjanadhamma.m bhijjati. ettha ca ^b^saya.m^eb^sadda.m ajjhaaharitvaa ``sayameva odano paccatii''tiaadinaa vuttepi ``puriso sayameva paa.na.m hanati. bhagavaa sayameva ^a^M0.0037^ea^ ~neyyadhamma.m abujjhii''ti payogesu parassa aa.nattisambhuutahananakriyaapa.tisedhamiva paropadesasambhuutabujjhanakriyaapa.tisedhanamiva ca a~n~nassa kriyaapa.tisedhanavasena vuttattaa yo ^b^saya.m^eb^saddavasena kammakattubhaavaparikappo, ta.m na pamaa.na.m. ^b^saya.m^eb^saddo hi suddhakattuatthepi dissati, na kevala.m ``sayameva piiyate paaniiya''ntiaadiisu kammattheyeva, tasmaa saasanaanuruupena attho gahetabbo naya~n~nuuhi.
[03] kaamagu.nehi dibbati. paccaamitte dibbati. a~n~naanipi yojetabbaani.
[03] puriso magga.m gacchati. gambhiiresupi atthesu ~naa.na.m gacchati. dhamma.m carati. tattha tattha carati.
[03] paasaada.m passati, paasaada.m dakkhati paasaado dissati. a~n~naanipi yojetabbaani.
[03] mata.m vaa amma rodanti, idha nandati pecca nandati.
[03] puriso gaamaa niggacchati, dhana.m adhigacchati, puriso paa.na.m abhibhavati, himavataa pabhavanti mahaanadiyo. a~n~naanipi payogaani yojetabbaani.

[03] tattha yadi saasane ^b^paca^eb^dhaatussa kammani ruupa.m siyaa, ``purisena kamma.m kariyatii''ti payogo viya ``purisena odano paciyatii''ti payogo icchitabbo. ye pana garuu ``tayaa paccate odano''tiaadiini icchanti, te saddasatthanaya.m nissaaya vadanti ma~n~ne. eva.m santepi upaparikkhitvaa yuttaani ce, gahetabbaani. kaarite ``puriso purisena purisa.m vaa odana.m paaceti, paacayati, paacaapeti, paacaapayati. purisena puriso odana.m paaciyati, paacayiyati, paacaapiyati, paacaapayiyatii''ti ruupaani bhavanti. ``yathaa da.n.dena gopaalo, gaava.m paaceti gocara''ntiaadiisu a~n~nopi attho da.t.thabbo.

[03] paca.m, pacanto, pacantii, pacamaano, pacamaanaa. paatabba.m, pacita.m, pacitabba.m, pacaniiya.m, pacitu.m, pacitvaa. ettha ca ``imassa ma.msa~nca paatabba''nti payogo udaahara.na.m. ``pacati, pacanti. pacasii''tiaadi padakkamo subodho.
[22] para.m na byaakarissa.m so, saasane iirito na hi..
[03] ^b^chu^eb^ ^a^M0.0039^ea^ ^b^chedane^eb^. choti. chotvaana mo.li.m varagandhavaasita.m. acchocchu.mvata bho rukkha.m.
[03] ^b^milecha aviyattaaya.m vaacaaya.m^eb^. milecchati, milakkhu. paccantimesu janapadesu paccaajaato hoti milakkhuusu avi~n~naataaresu.
[03] ^b^achi aayaame^eb^. a~ncati. diigha.m vaa a~nchanto diigha.m a~nchaamiiti pajaanaati.
[03] ^b^muccha mohamucchaasu^eb^. mucchati. mucchito visavegena, visa~n~nii samapajjatha. mucchaa, mucchitvaa.
[03] ^b^uchi u~nche. u~ncho^eb^ pariyesana.m. u~nchati. u~nchaacariyaaya iihatha.

[03] ^b^puccha pa~nhe^eb^ pucchati. pucchitaa, pucchako, pu.t.tho, pucchito, pucchaa. bhikkhu vinayadhara.m pa~nha.m pucchati. pucchi, pucchitu.m. pucchitvaa. ettha ca pa~ncavidhaa pucchaa adi.t.thajotanaapucchaa di.t.thasa.msandanaapucchaa vimaticchedanaapucchaa anumatipucchaa kathetukamyataapucchaati. taasa.m naanatta.m ^b^a.t.thasaalini^eb^yaadito gahetabba.m.

[03] ^b^vutta^eb^saddo kesohara.nepi dissati ``kaapa.tiko maa.navo daharo vuttasiro''tiaadiisu. ettha ca ^b^sira^eb^saddena siroruhaa vuttaa yathaa ^bma~ncasaddena ma~nca.t.thaa, ^b^cakkhu^eb^saddena ca cakkhunissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m. ropitepi ``yathaa saaradika.m biija.m, khette vutta.m viruuhatii''tiaadiisu. kathitepi ``vuttamida.m bhagavataa, vuttamarahataa''tiaadisu. atrida.m vuccati --
[22] kesohaare ropite ca, kathite ca yathaakkamanti..

[03] aparo nayo -- ^b^vutta^eb^saddo ``no ca kho pa.tivutta''ntiaadiisu vaapasamiikara.ne dissati. ``pannalomo paradattavutto''tiaadiisu jiivitavuttiya.m. ``pa.n.dupalaaso bandhanaa pavutto''tiaadiisu apagame. ``giita.m pavutta.m samiihita''ntiaadiisu paavacanavasena pavattite. loke pana ``vutto paaraayano''tiaadiisu ajjhene dissati, atrida.m vuccati

[03] aparopi nayo -- ^b^vutta^eb^saddo saupasaggoca anupasaggo ca vapane vaapasamiikara.ne kesohaare jiivitavuttiya.m pamuttabhaave ^a^M0.0041^ea^ paavacanavasena pavattite ajjhene kathaneti evamaadiisu dissati. tathaa hesa --
[22] vuttaana.m phalamasnaati, yo mittaana.m na dubbhatii''ti

[07] aadiisu vapane aagato. ``no ca kho pa.tivutta''ntiaadiisu a.t.thadantakaadiihi vaapasamiikara.ne. ``kaapa.tiko maa.navo daharo vuttasiro''tiaadiisu kesohara.ne. ``pannalomo paradattavutto migabhuutena cetasaa viharatii''tiaadiisu jiivitavuttiya.m. ``seyyathaapi naama pa.n.dupalaaso bandhanaa pavutto abhabbo haritatthaayaa''tiaadiisu bandhanato pamuttabhaave. ``yesamida.m etarahi poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samiihita''ntiaadiisu paavacanabhaavena pavattite. loke pana ``vutto ga.no, vutto paaraayano''tiaadiisu ajjhene. ``vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa, dhammadaayaadaa me bhikkhave bhavatha, maa aamisadaayaadaa''tiaadiisu kathane. atrida.m vuccati --
[22] pavattite ca ajjhene, kathane caati lakkhaye.

[03] ^b^jijaye^eb^. jeti. jayati, paraajayati. dhamma.m caranto saamika.m paraajeti. dhamma.m caranto parajjati. raajaana.m jayaapesu.m. jayaapetvaa. ettha ^b^jayaapesu^eb^nti ``jayatu bhava''nti aasiisavacana.m vadi.msuuti attho. jayana.m, jita.m, jayo, vijita.m, jino, jetaa, jeto, jito maaro, maara.m jito, jitavaa, jitaavii, vijitaavii, maaraji, lokaji, odhijino, anodhijino, jito. vijito, jetu.m, vijetu.m, jitvaa, vijitvaa. imassa pana dhaatussa ^b^kiyaadi^eb^ga.na.m pattassa ``jinaati jinitvaa''tyaadiini ruupaani bhavanti.

[03] ^b^ji abhibhavane^eb^. jeti. jino. pubbe viya ruupaani. ettha ca ``tumhehi aananda sappurisehi vijita.m, pacchimaa janataasaalima.msodana.m atima~n~nissatii''ti paa.li abhibhavanatthasaadhakaa. ettha hi ^b^vijita^eb^nti adhibhuutanti attho.
[03] ^b^ju gatiya.m^eb^. ettha siighagati adhippetaa. javati. javana.m, javo, java.m, javanto, javanacitta.m, javanapa~n~no, javanaha.mso. manojava.m gacchati yenakaama.m.
[03] ^b^jekhaye^eb^. jiiyati. ^b^e^eb^kaarassa ^b^iiyaa^eb^deso. saasanaanuruupena ``ki.m ma.m dhanena jiiyethaa''ti hi paa.li dissati. saddasatthaviduu pana ``jaayatii''ti ruupa.m vadanti.
[03] ^b^vaja gatiya.m. dhaja dhaji^eb^ ca. vajati. abbajati. manussatta~nca abbaje. vajo, vajana.m, pavajana.m, pabbajjaa, pabbajito, pabbaajito.
[21] sakaa ra.t.thaa pabbaajito, a~n~na.m janapada.m gato.
[03] dhajati. dhajo. dha~njati. dha~njana.m. ettha ^b^dhajo^eb^ti ketu. ^b^dha~njana^eb^nti gamana.m.

[03] ^b^aja khepane ca^eb^. gatiapekkhakoyeva ^b^ca^eb^kaaro. ajati. ajo. ettha ^b^ajo^eb^ti e.lako. imaani panassa pariyaayavacanaani ``ajo e.lako urabbho avi me.n.do''ti. tattha ^b^urabbho^eb^ti e.lako, yo ``ajo''tipi vuccati. ^b^avii^eb^ti rattalomo e.lako. ^b^me.n.do^eb^ti ku.tilasi"ngo e.lako. tathaa hi ^b^janakajaatake^eb^ ajarathato me.n.darathaa visu.m vuttaa. apica ^b^aje.laka^eb^nti ajato e.lakassa visu.m vacanato ^b^e.laka^eb^saddena me.n.dopi gahetabbo, ^b^mahosadhajaataka.t.thakathaaya^eb^~nhi me.n.de.lakaana.m nibbisesataa vuttaati.
[03] ^b^ajja sajja ajjane. ajjana.m^eb^ ajjanakriyaa. ajjati. sajjati.
[03] ^b^khajja majjane ca. majjana.m^eb^ suddhi. byathanaapekkho ^b^ca^eb^kaaro. khajjati. khajjuuro.
[03] ^b^khaji gativekalle^eb^. kissa bhante ayyo kha~njatiiti. ubho kha~njaa. kha~njana.m, kha~njitu.m, kha~njitvaa.
[03] ^b^khaja kampane^eb^. khajati. ejaa. ettha ca ^b^ejaa^eb^ti laabhaadi.m pa.ticca ejati kampatiiti ejaa, balavata.nhaayeta.m naama.m.
[03] ^b^buja vajiranibbese^eb^. vajiranigghoseti keci viduu vadanti. bojati.
[03] ^b^laja laaja tajja bhassane^eb^. lajati. laajati. tajjati.
[03] ^b^laji dittiya~nca^eb^. bhassanaapekkho ^b^ca^eb^kaaro. la~njati. tatiyo nayala~njako. la~njeti pakaaseti suttatthanti la~njako.
[03] ^b^tuji balane ca. balana.m^eb^ balanakriyaa. hi.msaapekkhako ^b^ca^eb^kaaro. tu~njati.

[03] ^b^gaja kuji muji gajja^eb^ saddatthaa. gajati. ku~njati. mu~njati. gajo gajjati, megho gajjati. yattha daaso aamajaato, .thito thullaani gajjati. ma.ni gajjati. ~naa.nagajjana.m gajjati. gajjitu.m samattho. gajjitaa. gajjitvaa. tattha ^b^gajo^eb^ti hatthii. hatthissa hi anekaani naamaani --
[21] hatthii naago gajo dantii, ku~njaro vaara.no karii.
[21] thambho rammo dvipo ceva, hatthinii tu kare.nukaa.
[22] hatthipoto hatthicchaapo, bhi"nko ca kalabho bhave..
[03] ^b^caja caage^eb^. cajati. pariccajati. caago. pariccaago. cajana.m. caja.m, cajanto. cajamaano.
[03] ^b^sanja sa"nge. sa"ngo^eb^ lagana.m. sa~ncati. satto. sajana.m, satti. aasatti. sajitu.m. sajitvaa.
[03] ^b^bhaji bhajjane. bhajjana.m^eb^ taapakara.na.m. tilaani bhajjati. purisena bhajjamaanaani tilaani.

[03] ^b^tija nisaane, khamaaya~nca. nisaana.m^eb^ tikkhataakara.na.m. ^b^khamaa^eb^ khanti. tejati. titikkhati. tejano. tejo. tattha ^b^tejano^eb^ti ka.n.do saro usu. ^b^tejo^eb^ti suuriyo. atha vaa ^b^tejo^eb^ti tejana.m usmaa u.nhatta.m taapo. ^b^tejo^eb^ti vaa aanubhaavo pabhaavo.
[03] ^b^raaja dittiya.m bhaaja^eb^ ca. raajati. bhaajati. raajaa. raajinii. vanaraaji. raajitvaa. viraajitvaa. atra vi~n~nuunamatthavivara.ne kosallajananattha.m siloka.m racayaama --
[22] ne'tassa iti vatvaana, dve janaa kalaha.m karu.m..

[03] ettha ca pa.thamapaadassa dutiyapade ``me ahi ^b^mahii''^eb^ti chedo ``puttaa me atthi puttaa matthii''ti viya. ``mahi araaja mahaaraajaa''ti ca chedo ``yopi aya.m yopaaya''nti viya. ettha ^b^araaja^eb^saddo ``atikaramakaraacariyaa''ti ettha ^b^akarii^eb^ti atthavaacako ^b^akara^eb^saddo viya aakhyaataparokkhaavibhattiko da.t.thabbo. ^b^araaja^eb^ virociiti attho. aya.m pana gaathaaya pi.n.dattho ^b^``mahaaraaja^eb^ me ahi araaja, mama eva ahi araaja, na etassa iti vatvaa ^b^dve^eb^ ahitu.n.dikajanaa kalaha.m kari.msuu''ti.

[03] ^b^ranja raage^eb^. bhikkhu ciivara.m rajati. satto ruupaadiisu ra~njati. rajana.m. rajako. raago. viraago. haliddiraago. raajaa. raajinii. imassa ca ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.na.m pattassa ``rajjati virajjatii''ti ruupaani ^a^M0.0046^ea^ bhavanti. tattha ^b^rajana^eb^nti rajanavatthu. ^b^rajako^eb^ti rajakaaro vatthadhovanako. ^b^raago^eb^ti rajjanti sattaa tena, saya.m vaa ra~njati, ra~njanamattameva vaa etanti raago, ta.nhaa. imaani pana tadabhidhaanaani --
[21] raago lobho tasi.naa ca, ta.nhaa ejaa visattikaa.
[22] satti aasatti mucchaa ca, lubbhitatta~nca lubbhanaa..
[21] kaamo nikaamanaa icchaa, nikanti ca niyanti ca.
[22] vana~nca vanatho ceva, apekkhaa bhavanetti ca..
[21] anurodho ca saaraago, sa"ngo pa"nko ca sibbinii.

[03] ^b^viraago^eb^ti maggo nibbaana~nca. ^b^raajaa^eb^ti pathavissaro. ettha dhaatudvayavasena nibbacanaani niyyante. naanaasampattiihi raajati dibbati virocatiiti ^b^raajaa^eb^. daana~nca piyavacana~nca atthacariyaa ca samaanattataa caati imehi catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi attani mahaajana.m ra~njetiitipi ^b^raajaa. raajinii^eb^ti raajabhariyaa. tesa.m abhidhaanaani vuccante sahaabhidhaanantarehi --
[21] raajaa bhuupati devo ca, manujindo disampati.
[03] ^b^bhaja sevaaya.m^eb^. bhajati. bhajanaa. sambhajanaa. bhatti. sambhatti. bhattaa.

[03] ^b^yaja devapuujasa"ngatakara.nadaanadhammesu. devapuuja^eb^ggaha.nena buddhaadipuujaa gahitaa. ^b^sa"ngatakara.na.m^eb^ samodhaanakara.na.m. tathaa hi ^b^adhimuttattheravatthumhi^eb^ ``yadatthi sa"ngata.m ki~nci, bhavo vaa yattha labbhatii''ti gaathaaya.m ^b^sa"ngata^eb^saddena samodhaana.m vutta.m. ^b^daana.m^eb^ pariccaago. ^b^dhammo^eb^ jhaanasiilaadi. etesvatthesu ^b^yaja^eb^dhaatu vattati. pupphehi buddha.m yajati. devata.m yajati. devamanussehi bhagavaa yajiyati. ijjati. yi.t.tha.m. ya~n~no. yaago. dhammayaago. yajamaano sake pure. yi.t.thu.m, yajitu.m. puthuya~n~na.m yajitvaana. so.lasaparikkhaara.m mahaaya~n~na.m kattukaamo.
[03] ^b^majja sa.msuddhiya.m^eb^. majjati. baahira.m parimajjati. bhuumi.m sammajjati. majjana.m. sammajjanii.

[03] ^b^ni~nji suddhiya.m^eb^. ni~njati. pani~njati. ni~njitu.m. pani~njitu.m. ni~njitvaa. pani~njitvaa. aya.m pana paa.li ``tato tva.m moggallaana u.t.thaayaasanaa udakena akkhiini pani~njitvaa disaa anulokeyyaasii''ti.
[03] ^b^bhaja paake^eb^. tilaani bhajjati. bhajjamaanaa tilaani ca.

[03] ^b^ruja bha"nge^eb^. rujati. rujaa. rogo. ettha ^b^rujaa^eb^ti byaadhi rujana.t.thena. rogob^ti rujati bha~njati a"ngapacca"ngaaniiti rogo, byaadhiyeva, yo ``aata"nko''tipi ``aabaadho''tipi vuccati.

[03] ^b^bhuja ko.tille. aavi^eb^pubbo a~n~natthesu ca. urago bhujati. aabhujati. bhikkhu palla"nka.m aabhujati, uurubaddhaasana.m bandhatiiti attho. mahaasamuddo aabhujati, aava.t.tatiiti attho. keci pana ``osakkatii''ti attha.m vadanti. ``va.n.nadaana''nti aabhujati, manasi karotiiti attho. muulaani vibhujatiiti ^b^muulavibhujo,^eb^ ratho. ettha ca ^b^vibhujatii^eb^ti chindati. bhogo. bhogii. aabhogo. aabhujitvaa. ettha ca ^b^bhogo^eb^ti bhujayati ku.tila.m kariyatiiti bhogo, ahisariira.m. ^b^bhogii^eb^ti sappo.

[03] ^b^raji vijjhane^eb^. naago dantehi bhuumi.m ra~njati. aara~njati. ettha ca ``tathaagatara~njita.m itipii''ti nettipaa.li nidassana.m. tassattho ``ida.m sikkhattayasa"ngahita.m saasanabrahmacariya.m tathaagatagandhahatthino mahaavajira~naa.nasabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nadantehi ra~njita.m aara~njita.m, tebhuumakadhammaana.m aara~njana.t.thaanantipi vuccatii''ti. ^b^ra~njita^eb^nti hi ra~njati vijjhati etthaati ru~njita.m, ra~njana.t.thaana.m. ``ida.m nesa.m padakkanta''ntiaadimhi viya etassa saddassa siddhi veditabbaa adhikara.natthasambhavato.

[03] ^b^vijii bhayacalanesu. ii^eb^kaarantoya.m dhaatu, tenassa saniggahiitaagamaani ruupaani na santi. vejati. vego. dhammasa.mvego. sa.mvigo vegena palaayi. nadiivego. uumivego ^a^M0.0049^ea^, vaatavego. ettha ^b^dhammasa.mvego^eb^ti sahottappa.m ~naa.na.m. ``vego, javo, rayo''ti ime ekatthaa. ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.na.m pana pattassa ``vijjati sa.mvijjati ubbijjatii''ti ruupaani bhavanti dviga.nikattaa.
[03] ^b^lajja lajjane^eb^. lajjati. lajjaa. ^b^lajjaa^eb^ti hirii. yaa ``viri.lanaa''tipi vuccati.

[03] ^b^kujja adhomukhiikara.ne^eb^. kujjati. nikujjati. ukkujjati. pa.tikujjati. nikujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya. a~n~nissaa paatiyaa pa.tikujjati. avakujjo nipajjaha.m. tattha ^b^kujjati nikujjatii^eb^ti imaani ``carati vicaratii''ti padaani viya samaanatthaani, adhomukha.m karotiiti hi attho. ^b^ukkujjatii^eb^ti uparimukha.m karoti. ^b^pa.tikujjatii^eb^ti mukhe mukha.m .thapeti.

[03] ^b^jhe cintaaya.m^eb^. jhaayati, nijjhaayati, upanijjhaayati, ujjhaayati, sajjhaayati. jhaana.m, nijjhaana.m, upanijjhaana.m, ujjhaayana.m, sajjhaayana.m. nijjhatti. upajjhaa, upajjhaayo. jhaayii, ajjhaayako.

[03] tattha jhaayananti duvidha.m jhaayana.m sobhanamasobhana~nca. tesu sobhana.m ``jhaayii tapati braahma.no. jhaayaami ^a^M0.0050^ea^ akutobhayo''tiaadiisu da.t.thabba.m. asobhana.m pana ``tattha tattha jhaayanto nisiidi. adhomukho pajjhaayanto nisiidii''tiaadiisu da.t.thabba.m. ^b^jhaayii^eb^ti aaramma.nuupanijjhaanena vaa lakkha.nuupanijjhaanena vaa jhaayanasiilo cintanasiilo. jhaayii jhaanavaati attho. ^b^ajjhaayako^eb^ti ida.m ``na daanime jhaayanti, na daanime jhaayantiiti kho vaase.t.tha ajjhaayakaa ajjhaayakaatveva tatiya.m akkhara.m upanibbatta''nti eva.m pa.thamakappikakaale jhaanavirahitaana.m braahma.naana.m garahavacana.m uppanna.m, idaani pana ta.m ajjhaayatiiti ^b^ajjhaayako,^eb^ mante parivattetiiti iminaa atthena pasa.msaavacana.m katvaa voharantiiti. aya.m panattho ^b^``adhi^eb^pubbassa i ajjhayane''ti dhaatussa vasena gahetabbo. eva.m ^b^adhi^eb^pubbassa ^b^i^eb^dhaatussa vasena imassa dhaatussa atthaparivattana.m bhavati. ya.m sandhaaya ``ajjhaayako mantadharo''ti vutta.m.
[03] ^b^jhe dittiya.m^eb^. diipo jhaayati, daaruuni jhaayanti. ettha ^b^jhaayatii^eb^ti jalati. ^b^jhaayanajalana^eb^saddaa hi ekatthaa.

[03] ^b^~naa avabodhane^eb^. ``~naati, ~nanti, ~naasi. ~naatu, ~nantu. ~neyya, ~neyyu''ntiaadiini yathaapaavacana.m gahetabbaani. ~naati, ~naatako, a~n~no, ~natta.m, ~natti, pa~n~natti, vi~n~natti, sa~n~natti, sa~n~naa, sa~n~naa.na.m, pa~n~naa, pa~n~naa.na.m, ~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.na.m.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0051^ea^ ^b^~naatii^eb^ti jaanaati. puna ^b^~naatii^eb^ti bandhu. so hi ``aya.m amhaaka''nti ~naatabba.t.thena ~naatiiti. eva.m ~naatako. ^b^a~n~no^eb^ti di.t.thadhammikaadayo atthe na ~naati na jaanaatiiti a~n~no, avidvaa baaloti attho. ^b^~natta^eb^nti jaananabhaavo. ``yaavadeva anatthaaya, ~natta.m baalassa jaayatii''ti paa.li nidassana.m. ^b^sa~n~naa.na^eb^nti cihana.m. kaarite ``~naapeti sa~n~naapeti vi~n~naapayatii''tiaadiini bhavanti. yasmaa pana ``a~n~naati pa.tivijjhati. attattha.m vaa parattha.m vaa ~nassati. ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m. ekacce nabbha~n~na.msu, ekacce abbha~n~na.msuu''ti paa.liyo dissanti, tasmaa ^b^~naatii^eb^tiaadiini aakhyaatikapadaani di.t.thaaniyeva honti nayavasena. tathaa hi ^b^a~n~naatii^eb^ti ettha ^b^aa^eb^iti upasaggo, so parassakkharassa sa~n~noguccaara.nicchaaya rassa.m katvaa niddi.t.tho. ^b^~naatii^eb^ti saasane aakhyaatikapada.m di.t.tha.m, tasmaayeva ``~naati, ~nanti. ~naasii''tiaadinaa padamaalaakara.ne nattheva doso.
[03] ^b^~naa maara.natosananisaanesu. maara.na.m^eb^ jiivitindriyupacchedakara.na.m. ^b^tosana.m^eb^ tu.t.thi. ^b^nisaana.m^eb^ tikkhataa. ~natti. manu~n~na.m. pa~n~natti.

[03] ettha ^b^~nattii^eb^ti maaretiiti vaa tosetiiti vaa nisetiiti vaa attho. aya~nca ^b^~natti^eb^saddo ``vatti etaayaati vaacaa''ti ettha ^b^vatti^eb^saddo viya aakhyaatikapadanti da.t.thabbo. tathaa ^b^aadatte^eb^ti ettha vibhattibhuutassa ^b^te^eb^saddassa viya vibhattibhuutassa ^b^ti^eb^saddassa sa~n~nogabhaavo ca dhaatuantassarassa rassatta~nca. ^b^manu~n~na^eb^nti mana.m aabhuso ~neti tosetiiti manu~n~na.m. ayamattho ^b^mana^eb^sadduupapadassa ^b^aa^eb^pubbassimassa ^b^~naa^eb^dhaatussa vasena da.t.thabbo. ^b^pa~n~nattii^eb^ti naanappakaarato pavattinivaara.nena akusalaana.m dhammaana.m ~natti ^a^M0.0052^ea^ maara.na.m pa~n~natti. atha vaa dhamma.m su.nantaana.m dhammadesanaaya citte anekavidhena somanassuppaadana.m. atikhi.nabuddhiina.m anekavidhena ~naa.natikhi.nakara.na~nca pa~n~natti naama, tathaa sotuuna.m cittatosanena cittanisaanena ca pa~n~naapana.m pa~n~nattiiti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ^b^sa.ta rujaavisara.nagatyaavasaanesu. rujaa^eb^ pii.laa. ^b^visara.na.m^eb^ vipphara.na.m. ^b^gatyaavasaana.m^eb^ gatiyaa avasaana.m osaana.m abhaavakara.na.m, nisiidananti vutta.m hoti. sa.tati. saa.to vuccati saa.tako.
[03] ^b^khi.ta uttaasane^eb^. khe.tati, aakhe.tako, khe.to, ukkhe.tito, samukkhe.tito.

[03] ^b^ja.ta^eb^ ^a^M0.0053^ea^ ^b^gha.ta sa"nghaate^eb^. ja.tati. ja.taa, ja.tilo, ja.tii. antoja.taa bahija.taa, ja.taaya ja.titaa pajaa. kaarite ``so ima.m vija.taye ja.ta.m. arahattamaggakkha.ne vija.teti naamaa''ti payogo.
[03] ^b^bha.ta bhattiya.m^eb^. bha.tati. bha.to. vetana.m bha.tako yathaa.
[03] ^b^ta.ta ussaye. ussayo^eb^ aaroho ubbedho. ta.tati. ta.to, girita.to, nadiita.to, ta.tii, ta.ta.m.

[03] ^b^pi.ta saddasa"nghaa.tesu^eb^. pe.tati. pe.tako, pi.taka.m. ^bpi.takasaddo ``maa pi.takasampadaanenaa''tiaadiisu pariyattiya.m dissati. ``atha puriso aagaccheyya kudaalapi.taka.m aadaayaa''tiaadiisu yasmi.m kismi~nci bhaajane.
[03] ^b^ha.ta dittiya.m^eb^. ha.tati. haa.taka.m, ha.taka.m. ya.m jaataruupa.m ^b^ha.taka^eb^nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^a.ta pa.ta i.ta ki.ta ka.ta gatiya.m^eb^. a.tati. pa.tati. e.tati. ke.tati. ka.tati. pa.to icceva naamikapada.m di.t.tha.m. pa.tati ji.n.nabhaava.m ^a^M0.0054^ea^ gacchatiiti pa.to. ^b^pa.to^eb^ti vattha.m. vatthassa hi anekaani naamaani --
[21] pa.to co.lo saa.tako ca, vaaso vasanama.msuka.m.
[03] ^b^ru.ti lu.ti theyye^eb^. ru.n.tati. lu.n.tati. ru.n.tako. lu.n.tako.
[03] ^b^gha.ta cetaaya.m^eb^. gha.tati. gha.to. ^bgha.to vuccati kumbho. imaani tadabhidhaanaani --
[21] gha.to kumbho gha.tii kumbhii, tu.n.dikiro tu ukkhalii.
[03] ^b^ca.ta bha.ta paribhaasane de.ta^eb^ ca. ca.tati. bha.tati. de.tati.
[03] ^b^cu.ta chu.ta ku.ta chedane^eb^. cu.tati. chu.tati. ku.tati.

[03] ^b^.thaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0055^ea^ ^b^gatinivattiya.m. gatinivatti^eb^ uppajjamaanassa gamanassupacchedo. .thaati, .thanti. ti.t.thati. pati.t.thaati. adhi.t.thaati. adhi.t.theti. sa.n.thaati. sa.n.thahati. adhi.t.thahati. upa.t.thahati. .thaatu. ti.t.thatu. ti.t.theyya. a.t.tha, a.t.thu. a.t.thaa, a.t.thuu, a.t.thaasi, a.t.tha.msu. yaavassa kaayo .thassati. ti.t.thissati. upassuti ti.t.thissatha. a.t.thissaa, a.t.thissa.msu. ati.t.thissaa, ati.t.thissa.msu. .thaatu.m, upa.t.thaatu.m. upa.t.thahitu.m. adhi.t.thaatu.m. adhi.t.thahitu.m. .thatvaa, adhi.t.thitvaa. upa.t.thahitvaa, adhi.t.thahitvaa. .thaana.m, .thiti, sa.n.thiti, ava.t.thiti. sa.n.thaana.m, pa.t.thaana.m. upa.t.thaako, .thito. pabbata.t.tho bhuuma.t.tho. upa.t.thaha.m iccaadiini.

[03] tattha ^b^.thaana^eb^saddo issariya.thitikha.nakaara.nesu dissati. ``ki.m panaayasmaa devaanamindo kamma.m katvaa ima.m .thaana.m patto''tiaadiisu hi issariye dissati. ``.thaanakusalo hoti akkha.navedhii''tiaadiisu .thitiya.m. ``.thaanasopeta.m tathaagata.m pa.tibhaatii''tiaadiisu kha.ne. ``.thaana~nca .thaanaso ~natvaa a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanaso''tiaadiisu kaara.ne. kaara.na~nhi yasmaa tattha phala.m ti.t.thati tadaayattavuttibhaavena, tasmaa ^b^.thaana^eb^nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^pa.tha^eb^ ^a^M0.0056^ea^ ^b^viyattiya.m vaacaaya.m^eb^. dhamma.m pa.thati. paa.tho, nakkhattapaa.thako, so horapaa.thaka.m pucchi. sabbapaa.thii bhavissati. pa.thitu.m, pa.thitave, pa.thitvaa, pa.thitvaana, pa.thituna, pa.thiya, pa.thiyaana.

[03] eva.mvidha.m ^b^tu.m^eb^paccayantaadivibhaaga.m sabbattha yathaaraha.m vattukaamaapi gantha vitthaarabhayena na vadaama. avuttopi iidiso vibhaago nayaanusaarena yathaasambhava.m sabbattha yojetabbo. yattha pana paa.linidassanaadiviseso icchitabbo hoti, tattheveta.m dassessaama.

[03] ^b^va.tha thuuliye^eb^. va.thati. va.tharo. va.tharob^ti thuulaghanasariirasmi.m vattabbavacana.m. tathaa hi ^b^vinaya.t.thakathaaya.m ``va.tharo^eb^ti thuulo, thuulo ca ghanasariiro caaya.m bhikkhuuti vutta.m hotii''ti vutta.m.
[03] ^b^saa.tha balakkaare. balakkaaro^eb^ naama attano balena yathaajjhaasaya.m dabbalassa abhibhavana.m. saa.thati. saa.tho.
[03] ^b^u.tha ru.tha lu.tha upaghaate^eb^. o.thati. ro.thati. lo.thati.
[03] ^b^sa.tha ketave ca^eb^. pubbatthesu cakaaro. sa.thati. sa.tho ^b^sa.tho^eb^ti keraa.tiko vuccati.
[03] ^b^ku.thi lu.thi aalassiye ca. ca^eb^kaaro pubbatthe ca. ku.n.thati. ku.n.tho. lu.n.thati. lu.n.tho.
[03] ^b^ru.thi lu.thi a.thi gatiya.m^eb^. ru.n.thati. lu.n.thati. a.n.thati.
[03] ^b^e.tha he.tha vibaadhaaya.m^eb^. e.thati. he.thati. vihe.thati. vihe.thana.m.
[03] ^b^.di vihaayasagatiya.m gamanamatte ca^eb^. .deti, .dayati. .demaano. ucce saku.na .demaana. ye ma.m pure paccu.d.denti.
[21] ito bahiddhaa paasa.n.daa, di.t.thiisu pasiidanti te.
[22] na tesa.m dhamma.m rocemi, na te dhammassa kovidaa..
[03] ettha ca ^b^paasa.n.daa^eb^ti paasa.m .dentiiti paasa.n.daa, sattaana.m cittesu di.t.thipaasa.m khipantiiti attho. atha vaa ta.nhaapaasa.m di.t.thipaasa~nca .denti u.d.dentiiti paasa.n.daa.

[03] ^b^pa.di gatiya.m^eb^. pa.n.dati. pa.n.daa, pa.n.dito. ettha ^b^pa.n.daa^eb^ti pa~n~naa. saa hi sukhumesupi atthesu pa.n.dati gacchati dukkhaadiina.m pii.lanaadikampi aakaara.m jaanaatiiti ``pa.n.daa''ti vuccati. ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ti pa.n.daaya ito gato pavattoti pa.n.dito. atha vaa sa~njaataa pa.n.daa etassaati ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^. pa.n.dati ~naa.nagatiyaa gacchatiitipi ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^. tathaa hi ^b^a.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0059^ea^ vutta.m ``pa.n.dantiiti ^b^pa.n.ditaa^eb^. sandi.t.thikasamparaayikatthesu ~naa.nagatiyaa gacchantiiti attho''ti.
[03] ^b^va.d.dha va.d.dhane^eb^. va.d.dhati. siriva.d.dhako, dhanava.d.dhako, va.d.dhito, bu.d.dho. ettha ca ^b^va^eb^kaarassa ^b^ba^eb^kaaro, ^b^a^eb^kaarassa ^b^cu^eb^kaaro.
[03] ^b^ka.d.dha aaka.d.dhane^eb^. ka.d.dhati, aaka.d.dhati, nika.d.dhati. akaamaa parika.d.dhanti, uluuka~n~neva vaayasaa.

[03] ^b^a.na ra.na va.na bha.na ma.na ka.na sadde^eb^. a.nati. a.nako braahma.no. ra.nati. ra.na.m. va.nati. vaa.nako. bha.nati. bhaa.nako. ma.nati. ma.niko. ka.nati. kaa.no. tattha ^b^braahma.no^eb^ti brahma.m a.natiiti braahma.no, mante sajjhaayatiiti attho. akkharacintakaa pana ``brahmuno apacca.m ^b^braahma.no''^eb^ti vadanti. ariyaa pana baahitapaapattaa ^b^braahma.no^eb^ti.
[21] braahma.no ^a^M0.0060^ea^ sottiyo vippo, bhovaadii brahmabandhu ca.
[03] ^b^ra.na^eb^saddo ``sara.naa dhammaa ara.naa dhammaa''tiaadiisu kilesesu vattati. kilesaa hi ra.nanti kandanti etehiiti ^b^ra.naa^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ettha yuddhe vattati. ^b^ra.na.m katvaa^eb^ti hi yuddha.m katvaati attho. ``ti.na~nca ka.t.tha~nca ra.na.m karontaa, dhaavi.msu te a.t.thadisaa samantato''ti ettha cu.n.navicu.n.nakara.ne vattati. ^b^ra.na.m karontaa^eb^ti hi cu.n.navicu.n.na.m karontaati attho. eva.m atthavivara.nampi saddasa"nkhaatamattha.m antoyeva katvaa adhippaayatthavasena kata.m, na dhaatunaanatthavasenaati da.t.thabba.m. atha vaa dhaatuunamatthaatisayayogopi bhavati, tena eva.m atthavivara.na.m katantipi da.t.thabba.m.
[03] ^b^bha.na bha.nane^eb^. paritta.m bha.nati, vacana.m bha.nati. diighabhaa.nako, piyabhaa.nii, bhaa.navaaro. ettha bhaa.navaaroti --
[03] ^b^ghi.ni ghu.ni gha.ni gaha.ne^eb^. ghi.n.nati. ghu.n.nati. gha.n.nati.
[03] ^b^pa.na byavahaare, thutiya~nca^eb^. pa.nati vaa.nijo, vohaara.m karoti iccattho. saddho buddha.m pa.nati, thomayati iccattho, aapa.na.m, saapa.no gaamo.
[03] ^b^pii.na pii.nane. pii.nana.m^eb^ paripu.n.nataa. pii.nati. pii.no divaa na bhu~njati, pii.norakkha.msabaahu.
[03] ^b^sa.na abyattasadde^eb^. sa.nati. sa.nateva brahmaara~n~na.m. ^b^sa.natevaa^eb^ti nadati viya.
[03] ^b^pu.na nipu.ne^eb^. pu.nati, nipu.nati. nipu.nadhammo. ettha ca ^b^nipu.nasa.nhasukhumasaddaa^eb^ vevacanasaddaa ^b^kusalachekadakkha^eb^saddaa viyaati da.t.thabba.m.
[03] ^b^phu.na vikira.ne vidhunane ca^eb^. phu.nati. a"ngaarakaasu.m apare phu.nanti.

[03] ^b^te paalane. paalana.m^eb^ rakkha.na.m. taayati. taa.na.m, gotta.m, nakkhatta.m. aghassa taataa. kicchenaadhigataa bhogaa, te taato vidhami dhama.m. tattha ^b^gotta^eb^nti ga.m taayatiiti gotta.m. ``gotamo kassapo''ti hi aadinaa pavattamaana.m ga.m vacana.m buddhi~nca taayati eka.msikavisayataaya rakkhatiiti gotta.m. yathaa hi buddhi aaramma.nabhuutena atthena vinaa na vattati, tathaa abhidhaana.m abhidheyyabhuutena, tasmaa so gottasa"nkhaato attho taani taayati rakkhatiiti vuccati. ko pana soti? a~n~nakulaparamparaasaadhaara.na.m tassa kulassa aadipurisasammudita.m ta.mkulapariyaapannasaadhaara.na.m saama~n~naruupa.m.

[03] ^b^nakkhatta^eb^nti visamagatiyaa agantvaa attano viithiyaava gamanena nakkhana.m gamana.m taayati rakkhatiiti nakkhatta.m, ta.m pana assayujaadivasena sattaviisatividha.m hoti. tathaa hi assayujo ^a^M0.0063^ea^ bhara.nii kattikaa roha.nii migasiro addaa punabbasu phusso assaliso maagho pubbaphaggu.nii uttaraphaggu.nii hattho citta.m svaati visaakhaa anuraadhaa je.t.thaa muula.m pubbaasa.lha.m uttaraasa.lha.m saava.na.m dhanasi.t.thaa satabhisatta.m pubbabhaddapada.m uttarabhaddapada.m revatii caati ^b^sattaviisati nakkhattaani^eb^. taani pana attano gamana.t.thaana.m iisakampi na vijahanti ki~nci siigha.m ki~nci dandha.m, kadaaci siigha.m, kadaaci dandha.m, etto ito caati eva.m visamagatiyaa agantvaa yantacakke pa.tipaa.tiyaa yojitaani viya samappamaa.nagatiyaa attano viithiyaava gacchantaani ma.n.dalaakaarena sineru.m parivattanti. eva.m imaani nakkhana.m gamana.m taayanti rakkhantiiti nakkhattaaniiti vuccanti. poraa.naa pana ^b^khara^eb^dhaatuvasena ``nakkharanti na nassantiiti ^b^nakkhattaanii''^eb^ti aavocu.m, ``nakkhatta.m joti rikkha.m ta.m'' iccetaani nakkhattataarakaana.m naamaani. ``u.lu taaraa taarakaa''ti imaani pana sabbaasampi taarakaana.m saadhaara.nanaamaani. ^b^osadhii^eb^ti pana taarakaavisesassa naama.m.

[03] ^b^citi sa~n~naa.ne^eb^. sa~n~naa.na.mb^ cihana.m lakkha.nakara.na.m. cetati. cihana.m karotiiti attho. iikaarantavasena vuttattaa asmaa dhaatuto ^b^saki sa"nkaaya^eb^nti dhaatuto viya niggahiitaagamo na hoti. esa nayo a~n~nesupi iidisesu .thaanesu.

[03] ^b^pata gatiya.m^eb^. patati. papatati papaata.m, papateyyaha.m. paapatta.m niraya.m bhusa.m. ^b^aha.m^eb^saddena yojetabba.m, paapatta.m papatitosmiiti attho. paapattha niraya.m bhusa.m, sokumaaroti yojetabba.m, paapattha papatitoti attho. parokkhaapada~nhieta.m dvaya.m. ``paavada.m paavadaa''tiaadiisu viya upasaggapadassa diighabhaavo, tato ^b^a.m^eb^saddassa ^b^tta.m^eb^aadeso, ^b^a^eb^saddassa ca ^b^tthaa^eb^deso bhavati. acinteyyo hi paa.linayo.

[03] ^b^ata^eb^ ^a^M0.0064^ea^ ^b^saataccagamane. saataccagamana.m^eb^ nirantaragamana.m. atati. yasmaa pana ^b^ata^eb^dhaatu saataccagamanatthavaacikaa, tasmaa bhavaabhava.m dhaavanto jaatijaraabyaadhimara.naadibheda.m anekavihita.m sa.msaaradukkha.m atati satata.m gacchati paapu.naati adhigacchatiiti attaatipi nibbacanamicchitabba.m. atthantaravasena pana ``aahito aha.mmaano etthaati attaa, attabhaavo''ti ca ``sukhadukkha.m adati anubhavatiiti attaa''ti ca ``attamanoti piitisomanassena gahitamano''ti ca attho da.t.thabbo, yattha yattha yathaa yathaa attho labbhati, tattha tattha tathaa tathaa atthassa gahetabbatoti.

[03] ^b^ati bandhane^eb^. antati. anta.m. antiyatibandhiyati antagu.nenaati ^b^anta.m^eb^. idha ^b^anta^eb^ saddassa atthuddhaaro vuccate ``anta.m antagu.na.m udariya''nti ettha dvatti.msaakaarantogadha.m ku.napanta.m anta.m naama. ``kaayabandhanassa anto jiirati. haritanta.m vaa''ti ettha antimamariyaadanto anto naama. ``antamida.m bhikkhave jiivikaana''nti ettha laamakanto. ``sakkaayo eko anto''ti ettha ko.t.thaasanto. ``esevanto dukkhassa sappaccayasa"nkhayaa''ti ettha ko.tanto. icceva.m --

[03] ^b^kita nivaase rogaapanayane ca^eb^. ketati. saaketa.m na gara.m, niketo, niketa.m paavisi. aamodamaano gacchati sanniketa.m. tikicchati, cikicchati, cikicchaa, cikicchako. tattha ^b^saaketa^eb^nti saaya.m gahitavasana.t.thaanattaa saaketa.m, ^b^ya.m^eb^saddalopo.

[03] ^b^yata patiyatane. patiyatana.m^eb^ vaayaamakara.na.m. yatati. yati, yatavaa, payatana.m, aayatana.m, lokaayata.m. ettha ^b^aayatana^eb^nti aayatanato aayatana.m, cakkhuruupaadiini. etaani hi ta.mdvaaraaramma.nacittacetasikaa dhammaa sena sena anubhavanaadikiccena aayatanti u.t.thahanti gha.tanti vaayamanti etesuuti ``aayatanaanii''ti vuccanti. ettha pana ^b^niitanu^eb^dhaatuuna.m vasenapi aayatanasaddattho vattabbo siyaa, so uttari aavibhavissati.

[03] ^b^aayatana^eb^saddo nivaasa.t.thaane aakare samosara.na.t.thaane sa~njaatidese kaara.ne ca. tathaa hi ``loke issaraayatana.m vaasudevaayatana''ntiaadiisu nivaasa.t.thaane ^b^aayatana^eb^saddo vattati. ``suva.n.naayatana.m rajataayatana''ntiaadiisu aakare. saasane pana ``manorame aayatane, sevanti na.m viha"ngamaa''tiaadiisu samosara.na.t.thaane. ``dakkhi.naapatho gunna.m aayatana''ntiaadiisu sa~njaatidese. ``tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane''tiaadiisu kaara.ne vattatiiti ^a^M0.0066^ea^ veditabbo. so ca naanaapavattinimittavasena gahetabbo.
[21] nivaase aakaare ceva, jaatidese ca kaara.ne.

[03] ^b^lokaayata.m^eb^ naama ``sabba.m ucchi.t.tha.m, sabba.m nucchi.t.tha.m. seto kaako, kaa.lo bako iminaa ca iminaa ca kaara.nenaa''ti evamaadiniratthakakaara.napa.tisa.myutta.m titthiyasattha.m, ya.m loke ``vita.n.dasattha''nti vuccati, ya~nca sandhaaya bodhisatto asamadhuro vidhurapa.n.dito ``na seve lokaayatika.m, neta.m pa~n~naaya va.d.dhana''nti aaha. aayati.m hita.m tena loko na yatati na iihatiiti lokaayata.m, kinta.m? vita.n.dasattha.m. ta~nhi gantha.m nissaaya sattaa pu~n~nakriyaaya cittampi na uppaadenti. a~n~natthaapi hi eva.m vutta.m ^b^``lokaayatasippa^eb^nti `kaako seto, a.t.thiina.m setattaa, balaakaa rattaa, lohitassa rattattaa'ti evamaadinayappavatta.m paralokanibbaanaana.m pa.tisedhaka.m vita.n.dasatthasippa''nti.
[03] ^b^yuta juta bhaasane. bhaasana.m^eb^ udiira.na.m. yotati. jotati.

[03] ^b^jutadittiya.m^eb^. jotati, vijjotati. juti, joti. kaarite ``joteti, jotayitvaana saddhamma''nti payogaa. ettha ca ^b^jutii^eb^ti aaloko siri vaa. ^b^jotii^eb^ti pataapo. atha vaa ^b^jotii^eb^ti candaadiini. vuttampi ceta ^b^sirimaavimaana vatthua.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ ``jotiiti candimasuuriyanakkhattataarakaana.m saadhaara.nanaama''nti. atha vaa ``joti jotiparaaya.no''ti vacanato yo koci jotati khattiyakulaadiisu jaatattaa ca ruupasobhaayuttattaa ca, so ``jotii''ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^sita^eb^ ^a^M0.0067^ea^ ^b^va.n.no. sita^eb^dhaatu setava.n.ne vattati. ki~ncaapettha va.n.nasaama~n~na.m vutta.m, tathaapi idha niilapiitaadiisu setava.n.noyeva gahetabbo payogadassanavasena. setati. seta.m vattha.m. vaaccali"ngattaa pana ^b^seta^eb^saddo tili"ngo gahetabbo.
[21] ^bseta.m sita.m suci sukka.m, pa.n.dara.m dhavalampi ca.
[03] ^b^vatu vattane^eb^. vattati, pavattati, sa.mvattati, anuvattati, parivattati. pavatta.m.
[03] ^bkilota addabhaave. ^b^addabhaavo^eb^ tintabhaavo. kilotati, pakilotati, temetiiti attho. kaarite pakiloteti, pakilotayati. u.nhodakasmi.m pakilotayitvaa, temetvaati attho.
[03] ^b^kati chedane^eb^. ma.msa.m kantati, vikantati, ayokanto. sallakanto mahaaviiro. maa no ajja vikanti.msu, ra~n~no suudaa mahaanase.
[03] ^b^catii hi.msaagandhesu^eb^. iikaarantattaa imasmaa niggahiitaagamo na hoti. catati.

[03] ^b^thaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0068^ea^ ^b^gatinivattiya.m^eb^. thaati. avatthaa, vavatthaana.m, vavatthita.m, vanatho. ``chetvaa vana.m vanatha~ncaa''ti ettha hi mahantaa rukkhaa vana.m naama, khuddakaa pana tasmi.m vane .thitattaa vanatho naama vuccanti.
[03] ^b^thu thutiya.m^eb^. thavati, abhitthavati. thavanaa, abhitthavanaa, thuti, abhitthuti.
[21] yadi hi ruupinii siyaa, pa~n~naa me vasumatii na sameyya.
[03] tehi thutippasattho so, yenida.m thavita.m ~naa.na.m, buddhase.t.tho ca thomito. tatra ^b^thavanaa^eb^ti pasa.msanaa. pasa.msaaya hi anekaani naamaani.
[21] thavanaa ca pasa.msaa ca, silaaghaa va.n.nanaa thuti.

[03] ^b^the saddasa"nghaatesu^eb^. thiiyati, patitthiiyati. thii. atrimaa paa.liyo -- abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. thiyo na.m paribhaasi.msuuti. tatra ``thiiyati patitthiiyatii''timaani ^b^e^eb^kaara^b^ssiiyaa^eb^desavasena sambhuutaani. thiiyati sa"nghaata.m gacchati gabbho etissaati ^b^thii^eb^. aacariyaa pana ^b^itthii^eb^saddasseva eva.m nibbacana.m vadanti, na ^b^thii^eb^saddassa.
[21] gabbho thiiyati etissaa, iti ^b^thii^eb^ iti no ruci.
[22] aya.m vinicchayo patto, nicchaya.m bho su.naatha me..
[22] tathaa hi ``dve duve, ta.nhaa, tasi.naa''ti nidassana.m..
[21] icchatiiti nare itthii, icchaapetiiti vaa pana.
[21] ^bitthii thii vanitaa naarii, abalaa bhiiru sundarii.
[22] kantaa siimaninii maatu-gaamo piyaa ca kaaminii..
[21] gorii ca daarikaa ka~n~naa, kumaarii ca kumaarikaa.

[03] tathaa hi a.t.thavassikaa ^b^gorii^eb^tipi ^b^daarikaa^eb^tipi vuccati. dasavassikaa ^b^ka~n~naa^eb^ti vuccati. anibbiddhaa vaa yobbanitthii ka~n~naati vuccati. dvaadasavassikaa ^b^kumaarii^eb^tipi vuccati ^b^kumaarikaa^eb^tipi. atho jara.m appattaa ^b^yuvatii^eb^tipi ^b^taru.nii^eb^tipi ^b^maa.navikaa^eb^tipi vuccati. jara.m pattaa pana theriib^tipi ^b^mahallikaa^eb^tipi vuccati. purisesupi aya.m nayo yathaaraha.m veditabbo.

[03] ki~ncaapettha eva.m niyamo vutto, tathaapi katthaci aniyamavasenapi vohaaro pavattati. tathaa hi ``raajaa kumaaramaadaaya, raajaputtii ca daarika''nti ca ``acchaa ka.nhaajina.m ka~n~na''nti ca imaasa.m dvinna.m paa.liina.m vasena yaa itthii ^b^daarikaa^eb^saddena vattabbaa, saa ^b^ka~n~naa^eb^saddenapi vattabbaa jaataa. yaapi ^a^M0.0070^ea^ ca ^b^ka~n~naa^eb^saddena vattabbaa, saapi ^b^daarikaa^eb^saddena vattabbaa jaataa. tathaa ``raajaa kumaaramaadaaya, raajaputtii ca daarika''nti ca ``kumaariye upaseniye, nicca.m niga.lama.n.dite''ti ca imaasa.m pana paa.liina.m vasena yaa itthii ^b^daarikaa^eb^sadena vattabbaa, saa ^b^kumaarikaa^eb^saddenapi vattabbaa jaataa. yaa ca pana ^b^kumaarii^eb^saddena vattabbaa, saapi ^b^daarikaa^eb^saddena vattabbaa jaataa. apicettha ``raajaka~n~naa rucaa naamaa''ti ca ``tato maddimpi nhaapesu.m, sivika~n~naa samaagataa''ti ca imaasa.m dvinna.m paa.liina.m dassanato yaa anibbiddhaa vaa hotu nibbiddhaa vaa, yaava jara.m na paapu.naati, taava saa ka~n~naayeva naamaatipi veditabba.m.
